interaction: I am always available by phone, email, or whatsup
transit: My place being pretty central, the best way to get around is by foot or taxi which are not expensive in eilat

reviews.comments: Views! I was able to see the sunrise from behind the mountains and have a panoramic view of Eilat. Bed was comfortable and the coffee was greatly appreciated. Jojo had great communication and the check in process was easy. I would recommend this place to everyone wanting to stay in Eilat.
Really nice place, close to the beach, airport and central bus station...

Jojo’s place was great! Very close to the tayelet, convenient location. He also replied any time there was anything we needed and was very flexible :) all in all, cute place perfect for my boyfriend and me, good price and location, would recommend!

solid location, great communication by JoJo. my father stayed there for wedding festivities. place was one studio into a concerted apartment with 2 other studios. small rooms, but very comfortable. only issue was cleanliness, could have been cleaner across the board.

Cons: The place isn’t the same as the photos at all! In the photos it looks modern and clean. It looks like there’s a balcony. There’s an iron gate around the window so you can barely stick your hand outside to take a photo to make it look like a balcony. I imagine that’s what jail would feel like. In reality the place is so small, the furniture is old, I was really really disappointed! He divided a 3 bedroom apartment into 3 separate units. Your shower/bathtub is literally in the kitchen/living room...Not in the toilet area with the door. So you’ll have no privacy taking a shower. It’s one thing to be a good communicator. But he wouldn’t stop calling and texting me. If I’m busy like going through security at the border, or maybe I’m tired from the day and don’t feel like answering right away, he’ll keep texting and calling. It was annoying although he probably meant well. Last, he sent me a message saying he accidentally gave me the bigger room with the tub. As if he did me a favor. I would’ve preferred the room in the photo that has a shower in the bathroom not in the kitchen.

Pros: Great location 1 mile from the beach and 0.3 miles from the bars/pubs.
The A/C works great. No problem getting in touch with him.

Overall I would pay a bit more and stay in a hotel next time I come to Eilat. At least it will look more like the photos.
reviews.response: Unfortunately their is not much to answer to Rose who is a hypocrite and a liar, i let my previous 240 reviews speak for themselves. In addition rose would not have to pay a little more for the hotel but at least 4 times the amount she payed per night

reviews.comments:
Jojo's flat in Eilat was absolutely the perfect place to stay. The amazing view from the pictures is exactly what you would see upon your arrival.

The location is in very close proximity to the airport, mall, restaurants, and almost everything....

Jojo was a very attentive host that would literally respond quickly whenever you needed him or whether you had any questions about getting around.

This flat is gets two thumbs up and a A+, and I promise you would not regret booking this location.
Jojo was very friendly and excellent host. He always asking if we need anything and give the best tips for places to go.  We highly recommended JoJo and his cute apartment Thank you
Check in was very easy. JoJo is a great host with an apartment that is walkable to the beach. Everything was clean and taken care of.

This place was exactly as advertised.  Geeat space for a couple.  Very cose to shopping and eating out.  It was very clean which for me is a must.  Jojo provided clear instructions for both check in and check out and made a.point to check that all was going well with oit stay.  Tbis was our firat AirBnB stay and based on this we will definitely be using it more often.

Good use of small space. Great shower head. Good location. Host was very friendly on the phone, but responses took a long time.
Few amenities. Was awoken at 6:30 am due to pigeons , everyday, and twice they actually came in through the windows!
Ok for a short stay.
reviews.response: Close the window lady there is air-conditioning.... Lol (no pigeons actually came into the room)

reviews.comments: Joe's apartment is an excellent value, it is basic but bright, clean and well equipped. It has a great view, is a short walk to the beach promenade and bus station. It is also across the street from a supermarket and a great falafel sandwich shop, not to mention all the restaurants by the beach. We enjoyed our stay in Eilat very much.
Budget friendly and great location! It's about a 10min walk to the marina, where you have the beach and restaurants. The place worked perfectly for me.
Great place! Great location! Beautiful view... close to the airport and the beach. Jojo is great, very accommodating and understanding.

Wonderful place!! A 5 minute drive to practically anywhere in the city; the beaches, the beachwalk, the bars and clubs, the shopping center and the mall. Extremely fair price considering how centered and nice the place is. Size of a hotel room, comes with all amenities necessary, clean and neat, and has a beautiful view. Easy check in&check out, great communication with Jojo. We will definitely be staying here again in the future!

Jojo's place was perfect for our Eilat trip. Short walk from the bus station, the promenade and the restaurants and supermarkets.

Jojo was very available and gave clear access instructions. The place was clean and comfy, perfect for my girlfriend and I. Recommend it for your eilat trip!
Unbeatable location at a great price. 10 minute walk to the beach and malls. Not to mention the wonderful 7th story views of the bay! I would definitely stay again
Jojo was very detailed about how to check in and kept in contact throughout our stay! The location was perfect.
Jojo was easy to contact and helped us with anything we needed. The apartment was great, comfortable and great location. We really enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended!
Great location and easy check-in!

This really is in the heart of Eliat.  If your interested in nite life - beaches and all the tourist stuff, it's down the street and walkable.  The snorkeling at Orchid Beach would require a cab - but it's well worth it.  Rent some gear and go see one of the last living coral reefs.   I got a bit turned around while driving in but the landmark near the apartments is the Pyramid and the Irish Pub.  The small but efficient unit for one or two is just up the hill a few hundred yards.  Enjoyed my stay and Jojo's help.

Had a great  time at Jojo,s apartment. All you need for a great stay in a great location. The apartment was very clean. Had great communication when needed. Highly recommended. Loved the city and lots to do here.
Nice location... Walking distance to main shops... Easy parking.. JoJo was a little hard to deal with
reviews.response: Well I have 20 feedbacks saying I am helpful and friendly, the fact is that you did not want to stand and abide by house rules. Thus,I had to insist, this is probably why I did not recommend you, which is very rare

reviews.comments:
Jojo's apartment was a perfect place to stay! Amazing location, close to everything. The sea view is really nice. His home is cozy and clean and it has all the necessities for a very comfortable vacation.

Jojo was a great host, very responsive and helpful. I highly recommend this apartment for your Airbnb stay and would love to come back here next time I'm in Eilat.
reviews.response: Thank you for being a great guests

reviews.comments: The value for money is very low .. At the price that the property owner demands, you can take a room in a hotel, without paying for cleaning and service fees, and of course receive accordingly.  There were no towels, soap and shampoo that is so standard - there was none.  I was hoping that when I got to the apartment at 5pm she would already be clean and ready as he promised, even though the cleaner still cleaned the apartment at 5pm.  Besides, the room was really clean and the location is great with parking
It is good for a couple but you can find better price and room, I felt that I have been watched anyway there were some problems in the room when I arrived and I thought that there was a balcony.

Joel was quick to respond, helpful and very nice.
The place is small but had everything we needed. Its in a great location and has a great view of the sea and the city.
I loved staying in jojo's place.
Good host very easy to communicate the place itself  very nice simple and the location is a 7-minute walk from the main mall of Eilat and a 10-minute walk from the bitch
Jojo is a great host and his place has simply the most amazing views. Fantastic location as well - close to restaurants and beaches and he provided many helpful suggestions.

The place was very clean and had everything you would need for an overnight stay! Jojo was very hospitable and helped us out with great restaurant recommendations as well. He was quick to respond with any questions we had which was always great!

Everything was fine. We mostly loved the view and the short walking distance to the beach. From the Window you Can see the sunrise and the sunset as well.There is even a small 24/7 Supermarket under the building which was very convinient for us. Bars, Restaurants and a nice Shoppingcenter is only a few Minutes away. The appartment was clean and had everything we needed. Jojo was always reachable when we had questions. We definitely enjoyed our stay
Very good location, I guess for Eljat a reasonable price as well.
The checkin was super smooth, all the information was very clear and correct. Jojo is a very involved host and the location of the studio is super convenient! Plus: free parking in front :)
Nice place, quick response time, 5 minutes from the mall.
Jojo is a great host. The apartment suited us well for our needs.

Great location with incredible views from the 7th floor overlooking the southern part of Eilat. Cozy apartment within walking distance to city center, nearby 24hr grocery and plenty of taxis passing by. Highly recommended.

Thank you for hosting me. I enjoyed the stay in your modern and clean appartment very much, a great view on the city.  I absolutely recommend it for a stay in Eilat and will come back definitely. Best, Raimund
The flat was exactly what I expected regarding the pictures. Jojo gave us some great local recommendations!
Place exactly as advertised - clean, well located, and quiet.  Also good communication with Jojo.  Thanks!

Great host, flat is the same as described, not more not less. Great flat for the price, and the location of the apartment is amazing, falafel stand in 1 minute walk, grocery shop, beach is 8 minutes walk.

Our stay in jojo's place was great. He gave us perfect suggestions for restaurants and bars and he was always available online when we needed him! The view from the window is awesome!
Thank you for this amazing stay!
Nice Place and great host!
Great location, clean and all you need for a very good price! Jojo was a helpful, caring host! I can highly recommended staying!

Jojo is a wonderful host and owns probably the apartment with the best view over the city.
He was very organized, supplied us with all the necessary information all while being nice and relaxed. Great host :)
The apartment is located on the 7th floor with a great view over the city and sea. It is clean and tidy, equipped with all the necessary details and has a strong AC. There is enough room for two persons and their luggage and the bar stools are a smart detail. Just a person over 1.7 m will have to bend down a bit in the shower due to the fixed shower head.
We would come back anytime and can recommend the apartment and Jojo without hesitation.

The apartment is exactly as described. The location is very good, walking distance from the airport, beach, shops and restaurants. The check-in/out was very easy and the communication with Jojo was excellent.
Great LOCATION, near everything, great HOSPITALITY, COMMUNICATION with the host. Super clean, quite, great view, generally speaking perfect choice, Thank u Jojo!!

Jojo was an amazing host! When we arrived there was an issue with the toilet, we called him and even though he was out of town, he sent a plumber to fix this within an hour! Jojo called us to check that the plumber did his job fine, and he really cared that we will be satisfied. The location is great, 5 minutes walk from the beach, and the view of the Gulf of Eilat is fantastic. Highly recommended.
Very good location, cosy and clean apartment. Excellent communication. Jojo even borrow us some masks to do snorkeling! Highly recommend

The time in eilat was very nice. The apartment was located near the huge traffic circle in the west corner of the red Sea. It was quite enough but also good for walking all necessary bars. The view is great. Only the house seems a little big dirty. But the room was clean and very well prepared.
Jojo is also online if you need him.
Jojo's place location is great, very close to 24/7 supermarket, very close to the center and the beach. The room was clean and cozy. Thanks Jojo:)

Jojo will go out of his way to accommodate you! His place is lovely with a store right across the street to get anything you need. Close to the beach and boardwalk. There’s an elevator to get up to the 7th floor - which we didn’t see till after we hauled our suitcases up! Lol
Good central location with great shops nearby.  Good comms with Jojo.  Easy access and check in to the apt.    Kitchen amenities were sparse and could be improved.

My friend and I had a pleasant stay at Jojo’s place. He’s a great host, he has been checking on us every day asking us if we need anything. The apartment was very clean and it has an amazing view from the window. The position of the apartment is perfect, only 5-10 minute walk from promenade (Tayelet). If you want to go to the Aquarium or to the Dolphin Reef Beach you can take bus 16. The bus station is 5 minutes walk from the apartment, located on the opposite street of Canyon Ha Yam. I’d definitely stay here again!
It was really pleasant to stay here,thanks))

This place is quite perfect if you want to enjoy Eilat's beaches with a view. You can reach the beach by a short walk, like 500 meters from the apartment, there you find the hotel and shopping mall area , and thats also where the nightlife starts with shops, a little bazaar and theme rides. Or you can take bus number 15 to the beautiful corall area ( thats a must see ) or to see the doplhins or you can just visit calmer beaches. The apartment is quiet and there is a supermarket right behind the building, thats almost open all the time and has slightly better prices than the ones in the beach area. The apartment is clean , has a nice little bathroom and a big bed. You can cook for yourself or walk down to the nearby restaurants, before the beach. The central bus station is also near, like 500 meters, but to the other direction and to the right at the junction. From there you can reach the Dead Sea or Jerusalem, other locations. There is a small airport in Eilat too, so from the window you can see the airplanes landing, also from the beach, thats quite a cool site. They are not loud and they only go like once in an hour. The best feature of the apartment is the sight ! Sitting in the window you can can see the beach, the hotels, the airplanes landing, the ships out on the water, its really relaxing and you can enjoy a drink after the beach watching this sight. The apartment has a nice, sunny vibe, its comfortable and makes you feel happy. It is situated on a small hill, but its real close to the heart of everything, you can reach it with a comfortable walk, only problem if you are disabled maybe, then going up to the place could be a bit exhausting, but its really nothing , its not too high. I would choose this place again if i am to visit Eilat agin. Even the big fountain is close, but it wasnt working yet when we were there. Eilat is quite a relaxed place, the sea has the most beautiful fishes !

Jojos apartment fits well for two people. The space is small but has everything you need (small kitchen, big bed). We didn't meet Jojo in person but he was still a very good host - very friendly and professional, helping us with everything via (Hidden by Airbnb) and even lending us masks for snorkelling (thanks again!!) The house itself was unfortunately a little dirty but the apartment was clean.

Very good communiction and organisation.
The flat was very suitable and comfortable.
The view - wonderfull.
24/7 Shop just in the front of house - good equipped.
Beach , airport in Eilat- not far away,
But planes doesnt fly at night.
(-) city centre is also not far away so audible sounds of parties on weekend.

I can recommend this place
Very helpful host and easy keysafe check-in. Perfect location. Very friendly and helpful. Nice, clean and has everything you need. Two thumbs up!!!
Look for my statement und (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) .

I recommend JoJo's apartment 2/7 without any limitation. The view over
this part of Eilat and. the Red Sea is superb and changes during the day many times but always in a spectacular way. The interior oft the room is satisfying by design and very well equipped. The WLAN is excellent.
Don't hesitate any longer: Book it.

Jojo is a really nice host! He was always in contact with us and helped us with all the little things we needed. The apartment is really comfortable and has everything you need to cook your own meal. Only 10 minutes to the Central Bus Station by foot and 10 min. to the beach. The location is really good for exploring Eilat to the fullest. The view is really nice, we enjoyed it every morning. 1 min. to the next store to buy some food and cheap falafel (compared average prices of Eilat) I can recommend this apartment to everybody.
I recommend the apartment and Jojo as a host!!!

Great location! Very close to city center and we could walk almost everywhere.  Nice view to the city as well. Studio was as on the photos, simple, but clean. We arrived at night and thanks to great instructions from Jojo, check-in was super easy. Jojo is very kind and helpful host. We would definitely recommend this plce for nice stay in Eilat!
Great location! Jojo is very fast replying and will give all information needed.
good enough
Fine room with Nice view over the Red Sea!

A nice apartment, very centrally located. It is well-equipped and has fast w-lan-internet (Eilat offers also city-free wlan in the city but this is quite slow.)
A small supermarket is just around the corner.
Eilat and the apartment are to be recommended.
Great host, great place - recommended!

Jojo's apartment is perfectly located, 7th floor with the best view on the Akaba bay, 5 min from the beach and marina, falafel place and grocery store just on the other side of the street. The flat is perfectly clean, the bed comfortable and Jojo is extremely helpful, not only the provided check in and out hints are great, but he also helped us with printing boarding passes on the very late notice. It was a real pleasure to stay in Jojo's place :)

Jojo's flat is a fantastic find on the seventh floor with beautiful views out across the beach. A five minute walk from the beach, Jojo's place is perfectly placed so that you can get a good night's sleep (even with the window open) and yet still be almost in the heart of all the action. The flat itself is great with a really comfortable bed, clean and well looked after. Jojo is a very friendly guy, and it was an absolute pleasure staying in his flat.
great placed. stay there if you visit Eilat. great location , and jojo was very promt and helpfull. thanks!

Wonderful apartment right in the heart of Eilat. The room has amazing views of the sea and surrounding mountains and is a five minute walk to the shopping and eating places. The beautiful coral reef is a ten minute car journey. Overall our stay at Jojo’s was perfect, jojo provided detailed information on checking in, the apartment was clean and jojo was always available to help with anything or offer advice on where to go. We will definitely be staying again.
Perfectly located appartment. Ideal to explore Eilat and its surroundings. Jojo was very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this place!

Jojo is an excellent, communicative host. He was very knowledgeable and informative about the Eilat area, which was greatly appreciated. The property is clean, as described in the listing, and in an excellent location close to central beaches and the seafront shops and restaurants. I would not hesitate to recommend both Jojo as a host, and his property.
Apartment was well located and clean. I would stay there again.

Do not plan to cook a lot, just simple breakfast or evening tea, but you will enjoy your stay, very good host, location perfect. ,clean
Take your soap/ other things for a shower
If I am going to Eilat still, I will stop in the same place! Everything was good! Especially view from the window and comfortable position of the apartment

Jojo is really helpful, quick to relieve any problem.
Also location is very good.

Everything was great !
The location, the services and the communication with Jojo.
I will definitely recommend his place to others !

Idan
Jojo is a very nice, accomodating host. The studio appartment was really well kept and neat.

Nice flat totally like the picture and well located. Jojo was very aware of all our needs.
Two things can be upgraded : if you are planning to cook, there is only one hob which can be a little frustrating.
The window doesn't close well so if you come in hot season expext to live with the air conditionner switched on even when you sleep or the flat become immediatly a furnace.
Thanks for hosting us jojo
Perfect location 15 minutes walk from the airport, 10 minutes walk to the nearest beach. Beautiful view from the window. I really recommend staying in Jojo's flat.

This studio was perfect for my girlfriend and I to have a beach/city break for a week or so. It was well equipped enough for making breakfast, clean and in a very good location. We walked most everywhere, except to the south near Egypt. There are lots of local restaurants and delivery options. Jojo is an awesome host - regularly checks in with advice and to see how you are. Check-in instructions are really easy to follow too
Great location!
Hello, our stay at Joe's place was really nice due to perfect location and good value for money. Joe is very nice and communicative host. We appreciate it. Thank you.
Jojo was a great host and his place is very central and convinient with great views.
the apartment was nice and clean, very close to everything. the host is very nice and helful.

There is nothing to complain about Jojo's accommodation. It's clean, equipped with everything you need and the most important is, it's very central. Just a 5 minute walk to the beach. During our stay, we were able to find a parking place at the house. We would stay at Jojo again and would recommend it.
Communication with Jojo was really good. He is a nice guy. The apt is as described and seen on the photos. We enjoyed our time in Eilat, thanks Jojo.
Great location, very close to the tourism center and the beach and the host was nice and helpful.
reviews.response: Thanks hope to see you guys again

reviews.comments: The appartment had everything you need. It was clean and easy to access. I can recommend this accommodation.
Nice place... perfect located
We had the best time in eilat! Jojo apartment was perfect for us
Great!

Nice studio with a wonderful view. Grate location, close to everything. Walking distance from bus station and airport.

Jojo was helpful and a nice guy. Would stay here again!
Great apartment, location and view. Good value for money and Jojo is a really nice, relaxed guy.

We spent a week in Jojo's apartment. It is studio apartment with a spectacular view through the window. It is almost on the top of the hill so you can see the best of the city. Everything was prepared, clean and we could definately come back here again!!!!
reviews.response: It was very nice to have you and thanks for the chocolates

reviews.comments: מיקום מעולה במרכז העיר
המיקום נהדר והדירה הייתה נקייה ומסודרת, המטבח היה קצת דל בכלים (מחבת אחת, סיר אחד, שתי כוסות) אז אם מתכננים בישול כדאי להביא כלים נוספים. מעבר לזה הצ׳ק אין עבר חלק והשהות הייתה נעימה
reviews.response: You are just being cheap and mean because I couldn't let you stay after check out (Website hidden by Airbnb) says in the description a kitchenette which means a small kitchen and everything is listed on airbnb so sorry there was  no real oven and only one pot and one pan...what did you expect

reviews.comments: יחידה נהדרת אסתטית מאוד מיקום טוב - קרוב לכול, יש חניה בשפע מתחת לבניין. קומה גבוהה צופה לים. ממש אחלה. נהנינו מאוד ובטוח שנחוזר!

מקום נקי ,מיקום קרוב יחסית לטיילת
יש סופר מתחת לבנין ויש חניה חופשית לבנין (לא כחול לבן ).המארח היה זמין עבורינו בוואטסאפ כשהיה צורך
הדירה נעימה, נקייה, עם חניה זמינה וחינמית, במיקום מרכזי שקרוב להכל במרחק הליכה. jojo זמין לשאלות. מומלץ בחום!
אחלה דירה , מיקום מצוין
מיקום מעולה , צ’אק אין עצמי ונוח , בעלי דירה זמין לכל דבר
אין באמת חניה פרטית כפי שמצוין. מעבר לזה די נחמד..

Месторасположение удобное, до моря 5-7 минут с моря 10-12 из за горы:) рядом минимаркет 24 часа, дешево и все есть. Из минусов по квартире это одна большая квартира разделена на 3 отдельные студии, т.е. вы снимаете одну из них. нам повезло соседей не было, а так наверное слышимость присутствовала бы.. расчетный час соблюдается строго, очень принципиальный хозяин положил ключи в 15-00, и в 11:03 уже уточнял звонил, освободили ли мы номер.
Excelente atención muy recomendable
Останавливаемся в студии второй раз, все ОК!

Véritable atout du logement est sa proximité du centre (-5min à pied) , il a aussi une vue exceptionnelle sur la ville. Un peu petit mais idéal pour 2 voyageurs, appartement propre et conforme aux attentes, JoJo est très réactif à vos demandes et fait tout pour y répondre, une adresse que je recommande ++ :)

O quarto é bastante pequeno. Mas, limpo e atendeu todas as minhas necessidades. Jojo é bastante atencioso e disponível para nos atender. A vista do quarto (que é uma janela) é linda. Amei. Voltaria e recomendaria este local. A localização é excelente
Apartamento muy bien ubicado y con excelente vista. Muy fácil acceso.

Аккуратная , тихая, ухоженная комната , очень близко от центра Эйлата, удобное местоположение , куча парковки под домом , заботливый и приятный хозяин и отличный




Quiet, clean and near in the tourist spot. Easy to go walk by. Property responsible person care was good. Quiet environment.
Quick response from host.

Muchísimas gracias por todo!!! muy lindo tu departamento y hermosa tu atención siempre atento a todo lo que necesitábamos, sos un genio!!! la verdad que no me equivoqué en nada al haber elegido tu alojamiento y desde ya te digo que en un par de años cuando vuelva a Israel voy a volver a pasar unos días en Eilat y voy a querer alojarme otra vez en tu departamento...muchas gracias por todo!!!
Y para todos los que están leyendo esto, realmente no duden en el elegir este departamento, esta ubicado en el mejor lugar de Eilat cerca de todo, tiene una vista hermosa ya que es un séptimo piso, hay supermercados cerca y todo tipo de negocios, bares, discos y restaurantes, uno de los Mall también esta a unas cuadras, un placer alojarse acà!!!
Хорошая студия, чисто, очень близко в пляжу, магазинам, кафе. Рекомендуем и сами обязательно приедем снова!
Perfekte Lage. Netter Host.
Jojo è sempre disponibile e gentile, risponde a tutte le tue esigenze. Casa molto centrale
Centralt och bra boende. Bra kontakt med värden. Boendet rekommenderas
Ein wirklich toller Ausblick! und ein kurzer Weg zum Strand. Perfekte Lage.

Das Haus und das "Apartment" sollten am Besten abgerissen werden. So eine Unterkunft ist nicht für saubere/ruhige Leute geeignet. Lärm, bellende Hunde nachts, Katzen um herum..das Studioapartment ist eine grosse Enttäuschung.
reviews.response: Lol 150 reviews say you are just sour and cheap.... If you dont want noise dont choose the city center. If you looking for luxury get hotel 150$ next time... The worst part is that on whatsupp you thanked me 5 times and said everything was fine

reviews.comments: Квартира расположена в самом центре Эйлата, в пяти минутах от пляжа и торгового центра. Прямо возле дома находится небольшой продуктовый магазин и небольшая точка, где можно купить вкусную Питу. В квартире есть всё необходимое для отдыха. Все детали хорошо продуманы. Есть полотенца, посуда, кондиционер, телевизор. Особенно хочется отметить потрясающий вид из окна на залив, который невозможно забыть. Хозяин готов помочь или дать совет, если необходимо. Стоит связаться с ним и получить конкретные рекомендации о возможностях отдохнуть, вкусно поесть или сделать выгодную покупку.
Qu’il est au 7 eme étage !
reviews.response: Oui avec ascenseur et cest aussi ecrit dans les descriptif sur airbnb, deplus avec la vue de la fenetre les gens déduisent que cest pas au premier

reviews.comments: Studio à 5mn de la plage et commerces. Excellent séjour. Hôte disponible et à l'écoute. Tout était parfait.
Вполне прилично

Комната соответствует описанию и фотографиям. Удобное расположение квартиры. 5 мин до пляжа и остановки автобусной , чтобы доехать до коралловых пляжей. Рядом маленькие магазинчики. Недалеко большой супермаркет. Хозяин приветливый. Комната маленькая, но на короткий срок вполне подходит. Соответствует своей цене.

name: Orel Beautiful studio in Eilat
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Beach access – Beachfront - Guests can enjoy a nearby beach
Backyard - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Pets allowed - Assistance animals are always allowed
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: The studio is small and luxurious. The apartment has a private courtyard with a set of table and chairs that can serve as a fun meeting of the morning or just an evening glass of wine. Very nice and luxurious apartment. It has a separate entrance and is located in the city center, next to the supermarket, 12 minutes walk to the beautiful beach of Eilat.

reviews.comments: Orel’s property was perfect for my stay in Elat. The space was clean and ready for our arrival. Orel responds to messages quickly and is very helpful upon arrival. Great stay!
Great place and can walk to beach
reviews.response: Thank you very much! Hope to host you again in the future at one of our apartments

reviews.comments: Amazing space, amazing guy, all around a solid pick.
"Orel, we soo appreciated your hospitality. Your place meant our need. Clean and worked well for our short stay. You are a good host too!! Mahalo from Hawaii!!"

Highly recommend Orel! He was responsive, informative, and very helpful with all my questions and concerns. The place was perfect, very clean, and worth the price. It everything needed to enjoy and relax during my stay in Eilat. Will definitely be back!!!
The place was more than what we expected. Orel was very helpful and a wonderful host. We definitely will stay again .
Orel's Air BNB was perfect for me and my friend. Great location, comfortable, clean, and Orel was a great host. We hope to be back soon.
Hard to find, but worth the effort.
The place was good, could be a little cleaner. There is a washer and dryer which was great! The only negative is that it is hard to find.

Orel is a great host. This is my second stay at his place. The apartment has great air conditioning, is clean and wasperfect for all of my needs. I'll be happy to return again.
Thank you for a great time!
We stayed one night and this apartment was just what we needed. We arrived late at night and Orel met us in person to check us in; he was flexible and accommodating.
no
Amazing guy. Amazing location. Amazing city. Amazing suggestions. I hope to stay here again in the future with Orel.

We had a great stay at Orel's place. Orel is really nice and easy to communicate with. He was a great host . We stayed in his studio apartment with my 2 kids and small dog. The outdoor space had a sink and large dinig table, was nice for sitting outside. It was perfect for our needs. I look forward to returning to Orel's place in the future. Great value for a nice & clean air conditioned studio.
Thank you!

Orel is the nicest guy! He met us early even tho chek in was only at 2. He provided snorkels for us, he helped me with my cel phone and lent me a sim card. When i had problems with phone, he offered to come fix it at 1 am. The AC was fantastic, which was so appreciated as Eilat is soooooo hot!!! Only thing is, if you don't have a car, which we didn't; it's not centrally located. We tried walking to beach and tayelet cuz we love walking but ended up needing to take cabs bak n forth as the heat was so intense. I thought we would be closer.
SUPER CLEAN NICE AND CONVENIENT PLACE FOR A STAY IN EILAT. CLOSE TO HARBOUR AND OLD TOWN ! GREAT HOST !!
Orels place is great. He is a very hospitable and is perfect for anybody looking to enjoy themselves in Eilat.
Awesome place with a great garden for basil, mint etc. Highly recomend it

Orel's place itself was fine and he was generally a good host, with one glaring exception: we realized that there was a security camera filming the porch without our knowledge! As a group of four girls, we were incredibly uncomfortable to find that we were being filmed and surveilled and we would not have rented this listing had we known we were going to be surveilled the whole time! We had even changed out there/walked around in our swimsuits before we realized there was a security camera filming us. Totally inappropriate and unacceptable.
reviews.response:
There is a surveillance camera outside the property for security reasons only. With having this security camera I discovered that you were not truthful in the amount of guests you had originally booked and paid
for
The camera is there for the safety of the guests and the property

reviews.comments: Great place close to everything. Clean place and good communication.
This is a cozy space with all the basics in a nice location with easy parking.  Orel was very attentive and helpful at every turn!  Look forward to our next visit with him soon!
Orel was amazing. He helped us get set up really quickly and he was really responsive. The place was nice and the perfect accommodation for me and my friend.
Orel was a fantastic host. Very attentive and super available when questions or concerns came up. I would highly recommend the rental. We had a great time!
nice place
The apartment was nice and clean, great location. Orel was available at any time to answer and help.
Orel's place is perfect. it's situated right in center but yet in a quiet neighborhood. It was very clean and comfortable. Orel was extremely nice helping with anything. I strongly recommend

A lot smaller than we thought but really clean and cozy nonetheless. Orel was very helpful and a great host. They have a wash machine too!
The walk to the beach is around a 20 minute walk so keep that in mind when booking. Overall it was a great stay!
Thanks Orel!

Everything was as presented and promised.
Very good option in Eilat.
Highly Recommended, very quick response and a very cool place to stay in.
Everything went smoothly, the place is nice and clean, well equiped, with reasonable price (in very expensive city).  Can only recommend.
Great hospitality!
Nice little apartment! Orel is super nice and very quick to help and respond, would definitively recommend :)
reviews.response: Thank you very much! Hope to host you again in the future at one of our apartments

reviews.comments: Overall a good stay besides constant wifi issues and construction noise which wakes you up at 8 am every morning. If you prefer longer morning sleep would not advise. Orel is a great host though and helped with everything.

Orel is great host, he was very helpful when we needed to book the bus tickets too.
The place has a good location, 15 minutes from the beach, clean, but it is quite tiny so ideal only for 1-2 nights. Not easy to find it, ask for detailed directions before arrival (three different online maps put it into three different places)
Very good location. Orel very quickly write back, if asked he and quickly all help. Thank you Orel!

Orel’s place was just as advertised. It’s a great little spot, centrally located. Walk time to the beach and marina is as stated and it’s really easy to get around. Orel is extremely responsive and is happy to help with anything (He even gave us goggles and snorkels to use for snorkeling, which was unbelievable) I would definitely stay there again! :)

It was such a nice experience, to stay in this place. Orel is perfect hosts, ready to give you tips, and help you with whatever you need. Its easy to get to the center,and to the bus station by walk if you are planning trips to other cities. The place is comfy, clean, and quiet at night. We had such a wonderful days here, i totally recommend it to everyone!

Orel was a great host who welcomed us very nicely to his small apartment in Eilat. Communication went well and we had a good stay in his place. We can totally recommend  to stay here for visiting Eilat.

Orel - superhost, it means that he is welcoming and caring host and this is completely true: the apartment is comfortable, a special charm gives her patio with awning, where in the morning a very nice breakfast and evening dinner. All communications and appliances (air conditioning, smart TV, stove, toilet, refrigerator, hot water) work flawlessly. To the beach nearby, 15-20 minutes walking distance. In the next house there is a shop - very convenient. We had a great rest thanks to the excellent host Orel and the magnificent Red sea!
Place was sparkling clean when we arrived, had amazing communications from the host, over all a pleasant experience!
beautiful place, amazing communication, and nice location
Orel is a very nice guy and he is very helpful. The room is small, but there is everything you need for a short stay. In the night it was sometimes loud because of the cats that jump on the rooftop.

All you need for a good and safe stay.
Great and comfortable service, Quick response and fair trade.
Thank you!

The apartment is perfect. Small, but so clean and cozy. You’ll have there everything for comfortable life and Orel will definitely help you in any cases. Hospitable host, always smiling and polite. Highly recommend this variant to have a great time in Eilat! Thank you, Orel!)
Everything was good, clean Appartement, nice host.
Small but fine Appartement, everything you need is in it.
This was the cleanest place I have stayed at.   Basic but clean and comfortable.  Highly recommended.
Amazing host and great apartment, small but very cute and location is good

Orel is very nice and helpful and was super excepting of our dog.
Room very clean. Lots of spare towels in the closet. Hot water in the shower all the time with really good pressure. Nice neighborhood with a large park nearby, equipped for dogs and kids, located 25 minutes walk from the beach. 24/7 supermarkets around the corner. Free parking and plenty of it.
Fridge noise bothers because located right next to the bed. The mattress was a little stiff. Lots of pillows available. Room is improvised, closed part of the balcony with drywall. Comfortable kitchen table located in the balcony looks nice in pictures but around it is a mess of supplies and laundry equipment stacked up unaesthetically and visited by Orel daily for maintenance. Water in tab yellowish and not very tasty, recommend buying bottles. TV was fun connected to a computer with internet, nice stable WiFi. Fridge freezes food inside. Electric stove nice, located in the balcony among the cleaning supplies and a bit weak so not fully suitable for frying or cooking rise, more for heating up. Also great clean microwave available for reheating. Second Airbnb unit shares a wall with the balcony so some sounds from inside heard when sitting there, didn't bother us at all. Balcony surrounded by hight wooden fence for privacy. No safe in the room but camera installed filming outside the entrance. Kitchen fully equipped with plates, glasses, utensils and skillets.
Orel let us to check out late and we really thank him for that. He was a great host!
Overall - good value for money!

Orel was super nice and friendly. The place was clean and just perfect for three people. We also liked the location since it was near the beach but still away from the noise. Definetely recommend this place :)
Wonderful place, close to everything. Orel was very helpful!
You will find everything you need in little space, clean, good location, hosting, price..

Really nice place stay in Eilat. You will find everything that is needed in the apartment here. Orel is a perfect host, helpfull and fast answering. The place is worth to recommend !
:)
Orel is an attentive host. Thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
Orel is a great hoster, picked me up from the airport even at 23:00.

All what is written about Orel and his flat I can only repeat. It was great to stay at his place. Orel is a very clever young man.
The flat is near to the center, nice walk of 10 min, supermarket around the corner, parking for the car in front of the flat, it was clean and tidy. A bottle of water in the fridge - nice welcoming. Just perfect!
We had a perfect stay with everything we needed, including the opportunity to use the private garden

Orel was a lovely host! I got to Eilat late at night, and he was kind enough to pick me up at the central bus station.
The apartment was as described, and was perfect for one person few nights stay. It had all the essentials, public transportation was close by, and the Mall HaYam Mall area was a walking distance away.
If we will ever go to Eilat again, Orel's place is our first choice

Cute small apartment with a private entrance and courtyard.

The apartment is not centrally located but is a short cab ride or bus ride from the center. Amazing value compared to any apartment in the city center and considering the fact that cabs are very cheap in Eilat, this wasnt an issue for us. I recommend this place, especially if you're looking for something more quiet and homey.
Also, Orel was very nice and was very flexible with check in and check out was super easy.
Location is wonderful!
Or'el is a great host, we will be in March back!
You won't regret staying at Orel's place. When visiting Eilat again, I'll chose the same place.
Perfect place!!
Top

It was a pleasure to stay at Orel's place. We stayed there for 3 nights with a rented car. There is a free parking place 1 meter from the place. The neighbourhood is calm, except airplanes taking off & on time after time what fills with noise all the city as the airport is in the center of it. Orel is really a superhost. The needs of guests is his priority. There is also a hidden garden with lemon tree & spice plants we made tee of. I definitely recommend to experience Orel's hosting.

Next to this studio is another rental form Orel. Therefor it’s extremely noisy. We also think that the studio is not suitable for 4 people. We left a list with complains for the landlord, basicly it comes down to 3 topics: the place needs some extra kitchenequipment (coulder, canopener, wineglasses, bowls), the courtyard should be tidied up en the landlord should care about the privacy of his guests a bit more. If that will be fixed Orel will be a
superhost and this is- if your not too picky and sensitive to noises a fine place to stay for a couple of days.

orel is a great host.
its the second time i stayed in orel apartments was great !
Great place! Highly recommended
Orels quest house was more than expected, Orel had quick respons to our qustions. Service was very good.
Orel is a very nice guy and we were very happy to stay in his appartment for 2 nights. Eilat is a wonderful place for diving :)
Great place with a huge TV screen, recommended!!
nice place, walking distance to center. great host

Orel is a very good host and gave us good info.
We felt very comfortable in this apartment. The apartment is centrally located in a quiet area. There is a small supermarket nearby. The internet is good and you can watch Netflix movies for free.
We would book this apartment again when we are in Eilat.
Thank you, Orel.. :-)
Great place to stay in Eilat.  Orel was a great host. The apartment is clean and cozy. 15 min to the beach, 10 min to the street with good food. Would recommend in 100%
Very nice place and Orel is super helpful!
good place, a bit far from the beaches

Great value for money,
Nice place and Orel is great host.

The apartment was clean and as expected. Orel is a great host, who cares that the guest feels comfortable.

There’s a supermarket 5 minutes from the app and the beach can be reached within 15 minutes.
Great place! Highly recommend. Thank you

Super place and super host!
The place is perfect to stay in Eilat : clean and there are everything we needed (washing machine, full kitchen, big screen). Orel was very helpful !
We definitely recommend his place
Orel's place was nice and cozy. He was very helpful and the  communication was great. Orel was very flexible to our check in and check out times. Overall I would recommend to stay at his place.
The best place in Eilat
Thank you (:
it was amazing! thx Orel.
Never have such a generous host thank you for everything !!!

We booked this place only few hours before our arrival and Orel was happy to host us deapite last minute request. Communication was very good.

Orel is very friendly and welcoming host. He gave us some great tips and made sure we feel comfortable.

The studio is clean and comfy. There is a private garden/terrace with the big table. As for Location, the grocery store is just around the corner and the city center is walking distance.

Thanks :)

I was very happy to stay in this appartment. Orel is a graet host!
I am sure i will come back to Orel.
Great place! Thank you ..
The place is not what you'd call luxurious but it does the job. It is an economical way of staying in Eilat.
This airbnb was amazing! The host was incredible! By far The best place I've stayed at so far.

Was a wonderful experience, the communication with Orel was great, response very fast. The apartment is nice, in quite neighborhood, free parking space and not too far from city center, 4 minutes by car, 20 walking. I would recommend it to a couple.

Orel is a great host! We had a wonderful 2 nights stay at his apartment! The apartment has its own private entrance, as well as a small and comfortable yard with a big dining table and chairs. Netflix is available as well which is a nice bonus.

Orel is a great host. He answered very quickly to all of our questions and recommended lots of places nearby as well. The apartment was very clean and had a great location, close to the shop, beach and city center. I honestly recomment staying in Orel's apartment.

A great location, stunning view of the Red Sea from the backyard, several supermarkets within a 5 minute walk, and a really nice host as well. Everything you could wish for.

If we're ever going back to Eilat, we know where we'd love to stay again.

Pros: price/ quality for Eilat city is ok! ,just for overnight, good Communication with Orel, terrace where you can Grill, shop is 300m away, wi-fi
Cons: pretty far away from colar beach, you have walk uphills 1,5 km from closest beach, Terrasse has very loud washmashine.
In general: good Place for a Short trip for young couple.

We stayed at Orel's appartment for 5 days to do some snorkeling and enjoy the beautiful weather. The appartment was clean, small, but spatious enough for the two of us. It looks like the pictures, but recently a window was added to the appartment, which is nice to get some fresh air in. It's a 15 min walk down to the beach, coming back you have to hike up the hill so it takes a bit longer ;). Communication with Orel was good and he was very helpful with printing our boarding passes.
Everything fine, very fine! But stay in contact with Orel, because you may not immediately find the house. But then you will receive a pretty nice and clean Appartment!!
Orel is very helpful and kind guy Who helped us with everything we need. His apartment is amazing for the price he is asking. Our stay at Orel s place was great.
A
Great appartment with spacious terrace. Everyting is clean and works good. Orel is very friendly and helpfull. Shops are nearby and you can park the car next to the appartment which is perfect!
Orel was a really nice host! We welcomed us, showed us around, helped us with printing some stuff and stuff as always available for any question :-)! I would definitely come back!

the place is that tiny but clean amd confortable, has everything you need. added value is a large private terrasse and a tv/pc with netflix :) Orel is a great host, always responding immediately and happy to help with anything. we would come back, thanks for having us.

Orel hosted me and my girlfriend for 3 days. The appartment is really nice. Everything you need is there. Orel is also really a nice guy, easy going and helpfull. He even printed our boardingpasses and let us stay for 3 hours longer then the check out time. We had a lovely stay in eilat. Highly recommend 5/5.
Orel is very nice and helpful host and we felt safe. Place was as described - Netflix service at TV, I especially liked nice outdoor area with big dining table.
Very nice private room with all you need - like in a very good hotel room. We could enjoy our privacy and rest on our last day in Israel..
Orel was a great host, very friendly and helpful :)
The place is clean and comfortable. The host is very friendly and helpful. This is a good location, about 10 mins walk to the beach.
Very nice apartment with private garden, highly recommended!

Orel is a really nice and helpful host who made us feel really welcomed. The apartment is really clean and very convenient for a stay in Eilat. A Supermarket is right next to the apartment and the beach is accessible by a 10 minute walk. We also really enjoyed the big dining table on the terrace for Dinners. All in all, we were happy to stay at Orels place and would recommend it to others.

Orel is a great host, very helpful with local tips and prompt answers when contacted via chat.

The place is very clean and functional. The listing is very accurate and you should not get any surprises if you book with Orel. Here are just a few things I'd call out for you to consider:
- the apartment is a good 15 to 20 min walking from the beach, mostly uphill on the way back. Not critical if you don't mind walking.
- the apartment doesn't have a window. It's very clean and functional, but I wouldn't recommend it if you're planning on spending a lot of time in the apartment on a daily basis.
- the shower area can leak quite a bit throughout the bathroom floor if you take long showers. Dedicating a towel to contain the water handled the problem quite well for me.

Orel is a pleasant host who will help you at any time. His appartment is completely equiped by everything that is nessesery for comfortable stay. Good location near the central bus station if you want to reach the best beaches of Eilat area and a chip supermarket by the apt. This variant is also good for value.

Such a nice and cosy flat in the heart of Eilat. Walking distance to beach/ center. I really recommend you guys to accommodate at Orel's. Cheers man.
Ps. Netflix with big TV screen was awesome!
אוראל מקסים, נעים, זמין, עומד במילה שלו ובא לקראת כשאפשר וצריך. מומלץ!
Clean and accurate. The host is professional and adequate. Separate entrance, free netflix, enough space.
אוראל הוא דוגמא לכולנו. הוא יודע לארח כמו אף אחד אחר. דאג להכל ועזר לנו להנות חופשה מקסימה באילת. ממליצה בחום!

Orel was a great host! We really enjoyed his apartment and service. Orel is very generous and flexible and always is ready to help. Orel eccepted our request at 10 pm and within the hour our room was ready and clean ☺️ he also helped us get our next room abd all with a smile. We came with two dogs and it was no problem! Thank you for a great stay!
Orel was really good host and was very nice!!! Highly recommend!!

היינו שלושה ימים בדירה והיה מדהים !!!
השירותים נקיים המקלחת מפנקת,
מזגן ששמר עלינו מעולה מפני השמש.
גריל בר, טלוויזה גדולה מיטות נוחות,
כל מה שצריך בחופשה.
בעל הדירה נחמד מאוד ו ולא יהסס אפילו לרגע לעזור לכם.
תודה רבה אוראל ! בטוח שנחזור אלייך

Great value for money and super location. The flat was super clean with towels/sheets were provided (and a/c). We arrived in Eilat in a rental car and we used the parking lot behind the apartment building during our stay. We were crossing the boarder over to Jordan the next morning and Orel let us store our luggage in at his place for two nights which was awesome. I highly recommend this place and would stay here again.
Great place , for a great price !
Orel is an excellent host, he couldn't do enough for us. He went above and beyond our expectations. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone.
Lovely apartment with everything you need and in a great location close to the beach and resort areas. Definitely recommended!
We had a great time at Orels place. The communication worked without any problems and the room is nice and clean. Toda raba!
orel was an amazing host, he described the apartment accurately. we had a very pleasant stay.
Great host, was flexible with checkout time. Walkable distance to beach
It was great, thanks!

Orel was an amazing host. Helped us in anything we beeded and made sure we were comfortable.
The appartment Is basic, but with everything we needed, comfy and cozy, perfect for 2 people.
Thank you Orel!

Great value if you would like to visita Eilat and surroundings . The apartment was clean had good entertainment system and very good air conditioning. A very convenient kitchen for those who like to make a sandwich or two for the beach. Maybe not suitable for older people as it's not very close to the beach , but for younger folks it shouldn't be an issue.  All in all very good for the price
Great place. Very comfortable for a travelling couple. Highly recomend :)

The place is located in a quiet residential area within a walking distance (10 min) from seashore, the mall, and the promenade. Plenty of parking space right next to the apartment. Very nice quite place, very nice host. It was exactly what I needed for a short vacation.
Very clean the apartment, and near everything. It was an excellent weekend!!

Orel is a great guy, who gives a great effort to provide an excellent service.
The apartment is well equipped, clean and in a quiet area.
all and all, it was a wonderful experience, and i'll definitely return

בעל הדירה מקסים! דאג לכל הצרכים והיה זמין לכל דבר.
הדירה נהדרת, בדיוק מה שצריך לאילת. קרובה למרכז העיר ונעימה לשהייה.
תודה רבה (:

The apartment is clean and fully equipped. The location is great, ten minutes of walking to the center and the beach. Orel was a great host, very helpful and available. Great value for the money, highly recommended.

A nice place for whoever's looking for a simple place with TV, WiFi, bed and a small kitchen counter.

The host is extremely nice and answers quickly to anything you need.

The only down side we found is an unpleasant odor when flushing the toilet (probably an old pipe system). But other than that it was good.
This was a great place to stay and Orel was a great host. The apartment is clean and cozy. Would recommend in 100%.
אוראל היה בעל בית קשוב ולעניין. הגענו אני וחברה שלי לכמה ימים באילת לצלול, החדר היה מסודר ואוראל ווידא שיש לנו הכל. מומלץ מאוד.
Orel is very helpful, and has a lot of knowledge about Eilat. The apartment itself is great, and better than advertised. I was very happy to stay there.

Very cool new one room all the flat for a lone traveler or couple. You have all the essentials for a great value. Orel is a great host with good communication skills.  Thanks man and good luck) We'll surely recommend to our friends)

The owner of the apartment is charming, patient and helped us with all the questions. The location of the apartment is excellent, close to the sea and the mall. The apartment was very clean and tidy and nothing was missing, very pleased, I would definitely go back there again. Strongly recommends!

really fine and orel is really friendly.
I recommend you to go there.
The host canceled this reservation 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

היינו בדירה 3 ימים.
ניקיון: הדירה הייתה נקייה ומסודרת עם כל הציוד שצריך. בנוסף, יש חצר קטנה ונעימה לישיבה.
מיקום: מרחק מהעיר - כרבע שעה הליכה מהמרכז. הדרך היא ירידה\עלייה אבל זה ככה בהרבה מקומות באילת.
חשוב לא פחות, יש כ3 סופרים במרחק של 2 דקות הליכה כל אחד. אחלה מיקום.
מארח: אוראל היה נחמד מאוד וזמין בהודעות.
מי שמחפש מיקום טוב, מחיר זול, דירה נקייה ומסודרת, ואפילו חצר קטנה - מומלץ.

יחידה מעולה כולל פטיו קטן
מעולה לזוג מספק תמורה מלאהה
אוראל אחלה של בן אדם עם תקשורת מעולה המשכנו את השהות שלנו לכול הסופש 7 לילות סהכ
אחלה דירה , מיקום טוב, ממליץ מאוד!!!!

הדירה סיפקה לנו את כל מה שהיינו צריכים לכדי לנפוש באילת.
אנחנו זוג והיה לנו נוח ונעים, אוראל היה זמין לשאלות, ייעץ מהלב ועם חיוך כמו שאנחנו אוהבים בדיוק !
היה לנו מושלם, ממליצים בחום ואהבה !

אחלה דירה, נקיה, יש כל מה שזוג צריך בשביל לשהות באילת. המחיר סביר ביחס לתקופה.
הצ׳ק אין העצמאי נוח מאוד.
בצד השלילי מאוד מינימליסטית, הכיריים בחצר, אין פח במטבח וכו׳.
בשורה התחתונה- ממליצים

היחידה נקיה, נחמדה ומאובזרת טוב.

דירה נקייה וחדשה מאוד!

אוראל היה מאוד שירותי והגיב מהר לכל בקשה.
דירה מדהימה נהננו מכל רגע שרות מושלם !
היה פשוט מושלם !! השכרנו מאוראל שלוש דירות , למשפחה שנתקעה באילת והכול היה פשוט מושלם כל הדירות היו ברמה גבוהה מאוד הכול היה נקי מסודר ונהנהנו מאוד !
היה תענוג להתארח ולקבל יחס חם ומכל הלב(: אוראל מארח מקסים שהיה זמין בכל עת, דואג עד לפרטים הקטנים (בשפע) והיחידה שלו מאובזרת בכל מה שצריך ומעבר. מרחק 3 דקות ממיני סופר שזה מאוד נוח.
הכל בסדר, מאוד נקי, קשר טוב מאוד עם הבעלים.
אחלה של מקום יצאנו מאוד מרוצים
Отличное место для двоих. Комнатка небольшая, но уютная.Есть все для полноценного проживания. Находиться в тихом дворике. Рядом пара магазинчиков. До моря 20 мин пешком.
דירה קטנה במיקום מצוין באילת עם מטבחון מצויד. אוראל היה זמין טלפונית לכל שאלה ועניין.

Logement compact mais bien équipé. Convient bien pour 2 personnes
היה נהדר, עוד נחזור

Très bon accueil, présent et à l’écoute , très bon service après location , propreté irréprochable et équipement en très bon état de fonctionnement , terrasse très agréable à vivre qui offre un plus grand espace de vie
אירוח יוצא מין הכלל בן אדם מדהים עוזר בכל מה שאפשר ודירה מעולה
תודה רבה!

Malgré que nous sommes arrivés très tard Sorel nous a attendu et a été super sympathique m. En plus de cela le logement est propre et confortable. Pour la touche d’attention nous avions accès à Netflix même si nous ne l’avons pas utilisé car nous étions en parti à la plage.
Соответствует описанию. От моря минут 20 ходьбы , но я люблю этот район.
Mieszkanko dla dwóch osób bardzo fajne! Blisko sklep, nad morze kawałek trzeba przejść. Niedaleko dworzec autobusowy, skąd można pojechać wszędzie!
Une maison agréable ! Une hôte accueillant .  Près du centre ville
Die Unterkunft war wie angekündigt, sehr sauber und gepflegt. Nach anfänglichen Orientierungsschwierigkeiten war der Aufenthalt sehr schön.

Een nette ruimte, dicht bij het centrum van Eilat.
Orel is een aangename man om zaken mee te doen.
Een plus is ook de gratis netflix en de (Hidden by Airbnb) op tv.
אחלה דירה לזוג! בדיוק מה שצריך...
Super Unterkunft. Nette Terasse, Matratze gut und Netflix ;). Konnten die Waschmaschine mitbenutzen. Orel hat uns extra noch den Boarding Pass ausgedruckt.

Достаточно тихий приятный район,  чистая, уютная студия. Есть все необходимое для приятного времяпрепровождения. Хозяин замечательный, всегда отвечает на звонки, сообщения в приятном тоне и решает вопросы, если они возникают. Очень приятное впечатление! Рекомендую

Wir waren für 3 Nächte in der Unterkunft von Orel und es war einfach super! Er hat uns viel geholfen (auch unsere Flugtickets ausgedruckt) und hat uns viele Tipps gegeben. Die Unterkunft war auch schön und von der Lage her auch ganz in Ordnung. Kann es weiterempfehlen!

Studio très joli et bien agencé! A quelques minutes à pied du centre.
Orel nous a très bien accueilli et a été disponible pendant notre séjour !
Très bien, on recommande

אני ובן זוגי היינו בדירה והיה לנו ממש כיף, מרפסת גדולה נוחה ופרטית שיכולנו לשבת בה, חדר מספיק גדול לזוג, טלוויזיה מעולה עם מחשב ונטפליקס.. פשוט דירה מעולה!! מאוד מתאימה לבישולים למי שזה חשוב לו (מטבח מאובזר מעולה)
בקיצור נהנינו בטירוף ! תודה רבה אוראל
הדירה של אוראל ממש אחלה לזוג , היא נקייה ויש בה כל מה שצריך . יש חצר פרטית שאפשר לאכול בה ארוחות בוקר/ ערב. נסיעה של 4 דקות מהים. מעולה למי שרוצה לשלם חצי מחיר ממלון ומחפש מקום לישון בו.
אירוח אכפתי ומפנק יחס אישי יצאנו שמחים ומרוצים אנחנו בטוח נחזור!
Хорошее расположение, адекватная стоимость
אוראל מארח מאוד נחמד, מגיב במהירות והיחידה נמצאת כ1.5 קילומטר מהחוף הצפוני.

orel is a great host! very helpfull and nice. the appartment was very nice, with a yard and a place to eat outside, perfect for a couple or one guest. just 15 min of a very pleasant walk from the center (notice that on your way back you should take a taxi, cause the house is on a hill).
אוראל מארח מצויין! עזר בכל מה שיכל והיה מאוד נחמד. הדירה נעימה, יש חצר יחסית גדולה עם שולחן אוכל ואזור שאפשר לבשל בו. דירה מושלמת לזוג או יחיד.
רבע שעה הליכה נעימה וחא מעיקה מהמרכז (רק שימו לב שהבית נמצא על גבעה אז כדאי לקחת מונית בחזור..)

אנחנו זוג שהגיע לאילת לקורס צלילה והיינו בדירה שבוע שלם, הדירה מרוהטת, נקיה ומשופצת, נהננו מאוד מהמרפסת והעובדה שזו כניסה נפרדת ופרטית לחלוטין.
אוראל המארח עזר לנו בכל דבר שהיינו צריכים והיה באמת תענוג!

We are a couple who came to Eilat for a diving course and we were in the apartment for a whole week, the apartment is furnished, clean and renovated, we enjoyed the balcony very much and the fact that this is a separate entrance completely private.
The host Orel helped us with everything we needed and it was really a pleasure!

Прекрасная квартира-студия, чистая, без посторонних запахов, находиться в ней приятно. Расположена в 20 минутах ходьбы от пляжа, рядом за углом дома есть два продуктовых магазина, в которых есть все необходимые товары. В данной квартире возможно готовить себе еду, имеется электрическая плита. Обеденный стол находится на открытой площадке при квартире. Хозяин очень приветливый и дружелюбный, все покажет, ответит на все вопросы. Отдыхали парой, остались очень довольны. =))
אוראל היה מארח מקסים ובן אדם מאד נחמד! נהנו מאד תודה!

Wir waren zu dritt in dieser Unterkunft und es war etwas wenig Platz, meiner Meinung nach ist das mehr eine Unterkunft für zwei. Ansonsten ist Orel ein hervorragender und hilfsbereiter Host. Die Lage ist angenehm, da man lediglich maximal 20 min zu Fuß zum Strand benötigt und ein Supermarkt 1 min entfernt ist.
Malgré notre retard Orel nous as recu avec le sourire et un enthousiames contagieux , nous recommandons  vraiment

Bei Orel war es perfekt. Check-in und Check-out waren unkompliziert. Das Apartment ist super für 2 Personen, aber auch noch mehr hätten hier zum Schlafen Platz gehabt.
Orel antwortet schnell, hat uns von sich aus Schnorchel vorbei gebracht. Er wäscht auf der Terrasse seine Wäsche und kommt manchmal morgens vorbei, aber das haben wir gar nicht mitbekommen und das war okay. Parken ist dabei, WLAN auch.

Orel est juste génial. Il prend soin de vous. C'est sans doute l'un des meilleurs airbnb d'éliat. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent. Il y a deux grand lit, tout est propre. La terrasse est juste parfaite et en plus elle est privative. On peut cuisiner grâce à deux taques électriques et on peut même faire griller sa viande sur le barbecue. Orel vous conseille si vous avez le moindre soucis il est là et est toujours disponible. Un supermarché se trouve à même pas une minute. Le bus centrale station est à 10 minutes et les plages à environ 15 minutes. L'endroit est super calme et reposant. Bref je vous recommande tellement cet endroit.

Orel war super bemüht, uns alle Wünsche zu erfüllen und hat uns gute Tipps rund um Eilat gegeben.

Das kleine aber feine Appartement ist super für einen kurzen Aufenthalt.
Einziger kleiner Kritikpunkt ist die Terrasse, die eigentlich zum Appartement gehört, wo jedoch fast jeden Tag Wäsche gewaschen und aufgehängt wird. Für uns kein Problem, für Leute, die gern mehr Privatsphäre hätten und auf der Terrasse Zeit verbringen wollen vielleicht problematisch. Wenn man das jedoch im Vorweg abklärt, stellt das bestimmt ebenfalls kein Problem dar, so wie wir ihn kennengelernt haben.

Wir würden wiederkommen!

War mit einem Kollegen für zwei Nächte dort (Party und Tauchen) . Frisch renoviertes Apartment mit eigener Terrasse. Viel besser als beschrieben meiner Meinung nach da komplett neue Inneneinrichtung, gemütliches Bett, Netflix, Terrasse mit Grill, Waschmaschine, Supermarkt 2min zu Fuß. Badezimmer deutlich überm durchschnitt. Parkplatz direkt vor der Haustür wird Kameraüberwacht, ruhige und saubere Nachbarschaft. 15min zu Fuß zur Partymeile. Für die Tauchplätze braucht man ein Auto/Roller, 10min Fahrt. Orel war immer erreichbar und sehr engagiert. @Orel : thanks man, never had such a good money-value apartment and hosting on my Israel trip. Thanks for being there. Cheers from Munich.

Tökéltesen elégedettek voltunk a vendéglàtàssal, Orel nagyon figyelmes hàzigazda, mindennel ellàtott minket, amire szükségünk volt, sõt meg is lepett különlegességekkel, pl. bazsalikommal kis kertjébõl. A lakàs szép, ideàlis hely 2 személy részére.
Apartamento muito bom!!! O Orel é muito atencioso! Vale a pena
房子很新，应该是刚装修的。虽然卧室不大，但是卫生间空间很大，洗澡很舒服。Orel也很友好，虽然最初有些误会，但他很快登门澄清并道歉了。总体推荐。
Un très bon accueil et accompagnement tout au long du séjour Merci Orel  vous êtes très professionnel
Хорошее тихое место. Идеально подходит для тех кому нужны только душ и кровать.

name: דירה יפה משפחתית ומרווחת במרכז אילת
amenities: Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
description: מקום מרווח שמתאים למשפחות, עם המון מקום לבילוי ביחד.במרכז העיר קרוב לסופמרקטים, מסעדות , פיצריות, סופר פארם ובתי קפה,מרחק הליכה של כ 20 דקות מהחופים הצפונייםThe spaceנכס מאד מרווח עם הרבה אור וחלונות,מתאים במיוחד לאירוח משפחות עם ילדים,מזרונים חדשים ונוחיםמתאים גם לאנשי עסקים, יש אינטרנט מהיר ואפשרות נוחה לעבודה על מחשב בפינת האוכליש מטבח מאובזר עם כל מה שצריך בכדי לבשל כולל סירים מחבתות ותבלינים2 חדרי שינה גדוליםחדר הורים עם מיטה זוגיתחדר ילדים עם 2 מיטות יחיד+ לול מתקפל במידה ויש תינוקותOther things to noteהדירה נמצאת בקומה 3 ללא מעלית

name: the little blue house
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.

description: My townhouse is located in the center of town, with walking distance to shops, banks, supermarket, 1km to the beach, nightlife, restaurants and dining, and great views. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the neighborhood, and the light. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, surfers, divers and business travelers. You are welcome:)The spaceThe little blue house is a cosy with a peaceful garden and an upstairs bedroom.Guest accessEnjoy my peaceful garden in the center of town:)
additional_house_rules: -  guest must pay for destruction in or around the house
transit: Autumn to Springtime you van easily walk down to the beach when its not too hot. During the summertime June-September you should hire a car or use a taxi which costs about 25nis to the nearest beach.

reviews.comments: Great value for money:) very recommended!

Overall the cabin has everything you need but it very small and the location is 20 minutes walk to the center.

- well equipped and looking cosy.
- the place is surprisingly super small, I didn't figure this from the picture.
- The bed is hard.
- Very nice host

הזולה בחוץ ממש כיפית, דירה ממש נעימה ויש בה כל מה שצריך ומעבר.
החיסרון היחידי זה שהמיטה לא ממש נוחה

Really nice and sweet place, hard to believe this place is in the middle of Eilat. It’s like neverneverland ‍♂️

The only thing I will say is I personally found the bed too hard but there is also the option of the sofa bed which was better.

We have enjoyed a sweet silent hobbit place in the middle of the Eilat neighborhood. The flat of Suzanne is very convenient and is furnished in good taste. Be ready to climb to a gallery before you go to sleep. I will definitely recommend it to couples.
Suzanne was very kind and generous, the house was clean and the garden was lovely. Climbing up& down the stairs is a bit challenging . Over all , very nice
A small, romantic and intimate place in the heart of Eilat with all the right equipment
reviews.response: happy you enjoyed your stay.welcome back.

reviews.comments: Very nice and cozy place. We had great romantic vacation.
reviews.response: welcome back.

reviews.comments: Very quiet place, very well decorated, good hospitality, really upgraded our vacation , thank you very much Suzan .
Nice and quite place. Close to the beach, very convenient.
Who would have believed that little piece  of Tuscany can be found right in the middle of noisy Eilat !  Great place to stay for couples seeking some quiet time , the garden is spectacular !
reviews.response: thanks both of you for being so positive.welcome back.

reviews.comments: Very cozy little house. Best fo couples, romantic corner in Eilat. Every thing was nice and clean. In the fridge she left us a lot of fruits and veggies and some daiary products. In the bathroom the are soaps and shampoos. We had a very nice stay. Thank you!

Great place, with the best atmosphere you can find in Eilat.
Suzanne is amazing, I highly recommend the blue house.
Beautiful, authentic place . Very quiet but not far from the city center! Suzanne really kind person. That was the great time :)

If Eilat is an oyster, this place is the pearl.  A grand self-built house with a timber roof within a walled courtyard has an adjacent guesthouse  in which you shall lodge.  It looks upon a split-level courtyard shaded by abundant bougainvillea , across from an artists studio and a sun-dappled patio.   The guesthouse has saved space by means of an ingenious hinged stairway which lifts out of way entirely by means of an electric winch, by means of which you may relive your days as a factory foreman.   Wrapped about the main house you will find a stairway of iron railing which leads to an 'eagles nest' from which the entire environs may be surveyed.
reviews.response:
you are a poet my friend.
thank you so much

reviews.comments: Lovely , cosy, quiet with very bohemian atmosphere. Suzanne is lovely and the courtyard is wonderful for breakfast. A bit far from Beach - abt 20 min walk but max 10 mins by car. The plus is that its extremely Calm !
Great place
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very cute little house with a great garden. A wonderful oasis in Eilat that served us perfectly as a base to discover the desert or go snorkeling. Highly recommend it to single travelers or couples.
Suzanne is a great host, with caring touch for details. We have enjoyed our stay at her place - both beautiful and cozy.

Suzanne’s place is amazing. Stylish, comfortable, cosy, well thought through - just perfect. The porch and rooftop terrace make it superb for spending a summer night out by candlelight or watching the sunrise. Communication was very easy, and it was such a pleasant surprise when we opened the fridge and suzanne had stocked it with groceries for breakfast.
The location is good, close to shops in a quiet residential neighborhood. A car is useful if you plan on doing trips to the desert or further down the coast.
Definitely recommended!
reviews.response:
hi there .i hope the rest of your holiday was or is as good as the beginning.
good spring and summer to you both.i enjoyed having you.

reviews.comments: This in house in a sort of Nepalesi style is a little paradise inmidst a flood of less interesting buildings. The garden is a most beautiful relaxing place, the apartment cosy and done in a very creative way. During the night it is very calm which garantuees a good sleep. The location is not too far from the center and northern beach, if you like to walk and explore a little bit. Suzanne is very friendly and helpful.
reviews.response: hi there i do hope your father will get better and then of course you are very welcome back whenever possible

reviews.comments: The little blue house is a lovely cosy home, with a beautiful courtyard full of flowers. Suzanne left us several fruits, vegetables and breakfast food. She was also very welcoming, flexible with check-in/out and gave us several tips for food and places to visit. I would highly recommend staying here!

יש חצר מחוץ לדירה, כיפית ומגניבה.
