reviews.comments:
הבית מקסים ומיוחד, בנוי באהבה, ומעוצב בטוב טעם. המקום נקי ומסודר.
שירותים ומקלחת מצוחצחים ונוחים. מטבח מאובזר, ומקרר מלא במצרכים, לטעמנו. חצר מקסימה ומטופחת, שכיף לשהות בה. סוזן היתה נעימה, תקשורתית, וקשובה. ובכלל, האירוח נתן טעם של עוד.
reviews.response: תודה,תודה על החיוביות.

reviews.comments: נעים ביותר. אינטימי ופרטי. עיצוב מעולה. שווה ביותר! סוזן אישה נפלאה.
reviews.response: תודה על הסופרלטיבים

reviews.comments: אירוח מצוין
מקום שקט ונעים, הדירה מסודרת מאובזרת ומעוצבת בטעם טוב שנותן אוירה של חופשה.

האירוח אצל סוזן היה נפלא, המקום קסום ומזמין עם אווירה מיוחדת. נקי, מסודר ומאובזר.
סוזן באה לקראתנו בשעת הצ'ק אין וצ'ק אאוט, מה שהקל עלינו מאוד⁦
reviews.response: תודה אורן.אתפל במקלחת.גם בזרם אם אפשר וגם טמפ המים

reviews.comments: היה נפלא

המקום נחמד מאד, החצר ממש פרטית ונחמדה. סוזן קיבלה אותנו מאד יפה, הבית נקי ומצוחצח וגם היו כלים נאים לאוכל ואוכל במקרר.
חסרון שהפריע לנו היה הגישה לפינת השינה - העליה היא במתקן מדרגות שמורידים מלמעלה כשרוצים לעלות. כאשר המדרגות מורדות אין גישה נוחה לשירותים וגם לא ניתן לפתוח את המקרר, אז בשגרה מעלים אותן. בעיה נוספת עם המדרגות- העליה בהן מזכירה יותר סולם, ללא מעקה שניתן לאחוז בו. פחות מתאים לאנשים שצריכים לרדת לשירותים בלילה, יותר מתאים לצעירים.
בסופו של דבר המקום נחמד מאד והתמורה טובה לכסף, אבל עדיף להכיר את הנושא.
היחידה מצוידת היטב, הן במטבח ובמקרר המלא כל טוב שסוזאן מסדרת מראש.  היחידה קטנה מאוד, אך ישנה מחוץ לחדר, חצר נפלאה שבה אפשר לאכול ולהיענות מהשקט והשלווה של המקום.

Отличные апартаменты для пар. Очень тихо и романтично. Домик огорожен зеленью. Большой дворик с верандой и гамаком. Есть зона барбекью и кухня со всем необходимым. На крыше дома обзорная площадка. Прекрасное место!
reviews.response: so how do i see your response in hebrew? i do not understand russian at all

reviews.comments:
דירה קטנה עם חצר נחמד. המקום מתאים לזוג. מאוד יפה ונקי. מטבח מאובזר. יש הרבה חנויות בקרבת המקום.
ממש נהננו להתארח אצל סוזן. תודה רבה

תודה לסוזן המקסימה על אירוח אותנטי ונפלא.
דירה נעימה קומפקטית ויפייפיה, עם כל השירותים הנחוצים: מטבח מאובזר ואוכל לארוחת בוקר, שמפו ומרכך, ציוד לשנורקלים, מגבות לכל השהות.
סוזן קיבלה אותנו בשעות הבוקר המוקדמות ואפשרה לנו להישאר עד שעות הצהריים ביום האחרון מה שמאוד עזר ושיפר את החופשה.. לא מובן מאליו כלל.
בגינה יש פינות ישיבה, ערסל וחבלי תלייה לבגדים.
נהננו מכל רגע, אין ספק שנחזור שנית.
תודה רבה

Das Gartenhaus ist eine wundervolle Oase zum Verweilen. Suzanne hat ein kleines Paradies geschaffen, das wir nur uneingeschränkt empfehlen können. Alles was man sonst so braucht ist in dem Häuschen vorhanden.
החלב לנס קפה כבר במקרר.  מקום מקסים, נקי, מוקפד ומיוחד.  חצר פרטית לארוחה רומנטית או סתם קפה של בוקר.  מארחת אדיבה ומקצועית.  מטבח מאובזר  והפתעות קטנות ונחמדות.  בהחלט ממליץ ומתכוון לחזור.

הדירה מאוד מסודרת, נוחה ונקיה. הגינה יפה ומרווחת. אך אם זאת בעלת הדירה התגלתה כבנאדם גס ואגרסיבי-הזמנו בתמימות את אחי והאחיין שלי לארוחת ערב שקטה. בשלב מסוים בעלת הדירה ראתה את אחי ולא קיבלה את נוכחותם בצורה הולמת: ביקשה שיעזבו מיד, תוך כדי שהיא מרימה את הקול, קוראת לבן זוגי "שקרן" ולמרות שהוא התנצל בפניה על התקרית ושאל מה ניתן לעשות כדי לתקן את המצב, המשיכה לדבר באגרסיביות ולא קיבלה את התנצלותו. חבל שהערב שלנו נפגע.
לא נחזור בגלל היחס.
reviews.response: אני הישכרתי ל2 אנשים. היו 4 אנשים לא בהסקמתי.בדרך כלל הכניסה הוא בין (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ,נתתי לכם להיכנס ב09:00 ללא תוספת תשלום.שברתם מישטח גרנית בשווי 350 שח ולא אמרתם דבר .לא ביקשתי תוספת תשלום תמורה.אני חושבת שאתם די חוצבנים.

reviews.comments: Das Häuschen, und vorallem der Garten sind ein kleines Paradies! Die Lage ist sehr gut, da fußläufig die Stadt bzw. der Airport zu erreichen sind. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind direkt " nebenan", und dennoch ist es sehr ruhig.Parkmöglichkeiten findet man in der Umgebung. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt sehr genossen, und können die Unterkunft wärmstens empfehlen.

name: Apartment - Cheap Price
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: Low budget.Not far from  the Central bus station of Eilat, 10 minutes walking distance.Transfer from Ramon airport to the Central bus station of Eilat - Egged Line 30.Supermarkets  at walking distance.Airco in every rooms.Stop bus in front of the building for the North and South beaches .3 bedrooms, comfortable for 5 guests.For family, fully furnished: gas cooking, washer, dishes, linen, bath towels, masks and snorkels.Don't miss Petra and Wadi Rum, we work with Desert Eco Tours.The spaceOur apartment is very clean, situated in the center of the city, no parties allowed and no booking below 21 years old.Guest accessIt's your own appartment, only for you.No reservations under the age 21 possible.We do not allow parties in our apartment, we do not take cleaning fees but you are supposed to give it back the way you received it.Other things to noteWe offer different excursion Petra, jeep tour.. with best tour operator, and any diving or snorkeling tips.
additional_house_rules:
- Give us back the apartment in the same state that we give to you.
- Respect the neighbors.
-Not allowed under age 21

- Restitution de l'appartement dans le même état que nous vous l'avons donné.
 - Respecter le voisinage
interaction: You can contact us in all circumstances, we are at your disposal till 21:00.
transit: To get to the North or South beaches, you have a bus stop in front of the building.You are 15 minutes walk from the Northern beaches.The best beaches are situated South of Eilat, the bus can take you there.Taxis are available at any time of the day, just raise your hand and it takes care of you.

reviews.comments: great apartment with all the amenities needed

We had a great stay in Eilat and and Viviane's place was exactly what we were looking for in terms of accommodations. Super clean and great location. 5 minute drive from Marina and walking distance to some nice local coffee shops. Really a great value. Viviane offered us tips and ideas on what to do in the area.
We had a wonderful stay at Viviane's place. She was extremely kind, helpful, and flexible, and the apartment was clean, comfortable, and centrally located. Highly recommend!

Viviane’s place was great, exactly as it was advertised.  Very clean and comfortable. Not far from the city center. Viviane and her husband picked us up from the bus station to take us to the apartment. They even gave us helpful tips about taxis and crossing the border to Jordan. Viviane was quick to respond to messages and overall extremely helpful.
The apartment was very clean, spacious and very close to public transportation

The home was wonderful. The host met us in front of the place and checked us in. She gave us good tips on what to check out and where to eat. The home was very very spacious for the price and no more than a 10USD cab ride away from some of the best coral beaches I have seen. It is also walking distance to the best nightlife Eilat has to offer. The host made our stay great! Highly recommended

Vivian and Andre were super hospitable. We were able to use the snorkel gear in the apartment. It is close to grocery stores and restaurants. We took taxis to the beach. The varieties of fish on the live reefs close to the shore were amazing. We would definitely go back if we return.

Best value in Eilat. Plenty of room and Viviane had great suggestions for food, fun, and night life. The apartment was bigger than expected and the snorkel gear was an added benefit. The kitchen was well equipped and the washing machine made life much better. We would go back time and time again. Viviane was quick to answer questions and met us right away to show us around the place

Viviane's apartment is in a perfect location with easy access to the beach, shops, food and market. Communication and directions were excellent. The apartment is spacious and clean and a great value. My only advice is that if only 2 beds have sheets on them when you arrive and you require additional beds, request sheets, etc. prior to check-in or during check-in, as they are not accessible in the apartment. Thank you for your hospitality, would stay here again if ever back in Eilat.
Nice and clean very house, very nice hosts and friendly, they helped us to get to places we needed, diffnetly worth it

The host was a little short with me. But still is kind. That wouldn’t stop me from renting from her again as this is the second time using her. She was late to check in even tho I told her exactly what time I will be there. When I asked her how long till she gets there she said “soon, I will try my best” so I asked again “about how long? 5 mins or like 1 hour” she respond the same way in a semi sarcastic way, “soon, I will try my best”. I asked a third time telling her that we can leave and come back if she wants. But she replied exactly the same way. This got under my skin. She was also rushed in showing us the place. But that’s ok. She has a daughter who is into sports and you can tell she invests a lot of time in her. And wants her to succeed. Perhaps the host needs a person to help her run her many properties. But you know... the slight rudeness is what can you expect when dealing with people in Israel where the customer isn’t always right. I would still rent from her again. I just put this review so people can know what they’re getting into.

Cleanliness, it’s Israel standard not American standard. I wouldn’t say it’s dirty but it definitely could use some sort of renovation.

For Israel the price is right for what you get. Would recommend it to future guests.
reviews.response:
My dear Bryant,
Your review made me somehow smile because of the way you wrote that...you came for the second time, ....you will come back,....you suggest my places to other guests,.... but....you felt that I was short of time, kind of Israeli attitude.... let's put the right story in place please. You wrote that you will arrive after 18 pm. I called your wife the day before and so she told me. Yes I do have few other places and usually I plan my day to spend enough time with all of my guests! You arrived previous to the check time you told me and yes at that special moment I was busy taking my daughter from her training session but this is not a problem. You called me when I was driving my daughter back home and I told you that I will be there in few minutes couldn't have a conversation because I was driving and my daughter held the phone. To make the long story short it took me 10: minutes to arrive at our meeting point not a big deal since you were supposed to arrive at 18 pm!!
I did make a short check in and it seemed like suiting you as you wanted to go to the supermarket. I explained everything about the apartment also apologize about the fact that my neighbors left some construction deposit cause they renewed their apartment. You were mostly fine with that, telling me that you are for the second time my guest and will come back to me (Website hidden by Airbnb) dear Bryant your review is completely out of what you told me so as you said that you want to come back to me I surely think that you are not the type of guest I want to see again, find yourself another cheap place and do not come back to me. I somehow do not like double faces sorry. My apartment is immaculate, yes my neighbor was renovating but doesn't mean that my place was not clean. So long dear Bryant just for the ending Israelis are most of the time cleaner then other nationalitiess

reviews.comments: Great communication and location. Easy to get to and walk to different things. Easy parking on the street. Comfortable bed, and great hot water! She explained everything to us if we needed to cook, wash clothes, dry clothes etc. Excellent place for a group.
Great location and clean apartment! Viviane was amazing and gave us tips to where to go to the beach and eat.

Affordable and nice amenities in Eilat. Although not in an area where it’s close walking distance to the downtown area and beach, it was a nice place to stay at.
We loved that Viviane and Andre have snorkels for their guests. Was helpful because we didn’t have to rent any snorkeling equipment.
The apartment was clean and glad the washer worked well. No dryer but we just cracked open a window and our clothes dried fairly quick.
Hosts were very responsive and helpful. We would recommend it to anyone who anyone that is looking for a good affordable stay in Eilat.
Great stay! Thank you.
Apartment was just as described - clean, air conditioned and had all the amenities you could need! Viviane was quick to respond, prompt and explained everything during our tour. Highly recommended!
Very reasonable accomodations in a great location with a wonderful host! Viviane was very quick to respond to my messages and offered some really great tips on local places to visit.
Easy check in and clean place. Even snorkeling equipment was available (we brought our own) which was a nice touch.

We enjoyed excellent communication from the moment we booked. The place is only a 5-10 minute drive from several beaches (including the fantastic dolphin reef beach!) and there is a store with basic food items about a minute's walk away. Everything was very clean and in great condition. Two bedrooms with great mattresses plus a curtained off area in the living room with a bed. The only thing we could think of adding is something to use to cook with in the oven. We would definitely stay at Viviane's place again!
the apartment was very comfortable and a great value. we only stayed one night. was comfortable for a family of 6.
Viviane’s place was very clean. Not the best location in terms of walking distance to restaurants, but overall pleasant experience
Excellent value. Hosts were very accommodating, picking us up at airport when we arrived. We enjoyed our brief stay
We rested well after a long traveling . The place was quiet and clean and the mattresses were comfortable.

An economical choice in an expensive area. Very responsive hosts who know the area well and provide great tips on sights and restaurants. Two bedrooms plus a curtained off area in the living room with a bed. All the basics are provided.
Great host.  Superb communication.  Definitely very good value for the money.  Everything we needed was there in good shape.  I would definitely recommend.
Good location, clean place. Recommended.

Very spacious apartment. Maybe a 20 min walk down to the beach and boardwalk. Close to the bus station too. Also next to a convenient store that we never saw closed.
My favorite part of the trip was borrowing the snorkel gear to swim with the fishes. Would definitely stay here again if visiting Eilat with family.
reviews.response: Thanks for your nice review Mike, happy new year

reviews.comments: We would definitely come back to stay at Viviane’s.  She is nice and friendly! She provided clear instructions and was very communicative.
The stay at Viviane's place was great. It is ideal for multiple guests or larger families (two bedrooms, and another niche in the living room). Viviane and Andre were friendly and helpful:)

We got detailed explanation of apartment staff, a lot of recommendation about good and interesting places to visit in Eilat.
A little bit far from the beach, 15-20 minutes by foot.
Apartment is well equipped. Thanks to Viviane and Andre, surely will stay once again there, because of best quality/price rate.

Viviane's place is most comfortable and clean and spacious. The kitchen is well appointed for cooking meals: with an added bonus, a super washing machine, much appreciated by travelers. Andre and Viviane are excellent communicators and we enjoyed our 3 days in Eilat "coming home" to their place.

Vivianne was always instantly in touch, very friendly and helpful. She even managed to connect my cousin and me when our phones failed us and we had lost each other. The flat was simple, clean, quiet, safe and comfortable. Would happily stay again.
reviews.response: Merci beaucoup pour la petite enveloppe avec la carte et le joli magnet, et merci de votre visite vous êtes charmants, on espère vous revoir.

reviews.comments: The apartment is great. Very clean, spacious and conveniently located. Vivian was very welcoming. I would recommend it to all.

Viviane and her husband helped us coordinate a trip to Petra/Wadi Rum, their place was large enough to accommodate many more than the 4 of us. The air conditioning was magnificent, and it was very comfortable. The location initially felt a little rough, especially when (Hidden by Airbnb) struggled with the address, and with lots of cats outside on a rundown walkway, but we felt very safe and a couple neighbors even asked us how we were doing when we came home late at night. Overall, a great value and one we'd do again. :)
Our family of 5 was comfortable in the apartment.  We had a car and it was easy to get around and to park.  Viviane was friendly and helpful about Eilat and what to see, where to get eat, etc.
Host was super friendly and very accommodating. Loved the place would stay again
Basic, roomy appartment, great for exploring Eilat. Viviane was a great host. Our family of 5 had a great time.
Great, comfortable and close to everything. Awesome hosts..
We had a great time staying at the apartment. It was comfortable and close to the beach and downtown area. Viviane and her sister are a delight as well!
Great communication with Vivian. Simple but clean apartment. Fair value for money.

Vivians is a great host! We had a wounderful time in her apartment.
The location is a little bit far from the sea but there is a lot of parking lots near the apartment.
Thank you very much for everything—the fantastic company with a great location.
great place to stay in eilat
Nice place for divers!
Super nice, well equipped and clean apartment in quiet and friendly neighborhood. Lovely host. 100% recommended!!!
Great place, hospitable host. Will definately come stay again

A nice place to stay for a couple of days!
Love apartment, quiet, easy to locate and transport back and forth to the city by car.
Host was attentive and welcoming, there's a couple of kiosks and grocery stores nearby, and we had everything we needed.
Only downfall is the 3rd room - sadly it isn't a proper room, but rather more of a portion of the living room sealed off by a piece of cloth and no door.
None the less - good value for this listing:)
Came with my daughter for a diving trip and stayed for one night. The apartment has all the facilities a guest might need, It is very nice, comfortable and clean.
Very nice host, the apartment was very clean
The apartment is one of the bigger I've been at in Eilat. Very comfortable and the owner is very nice and easy to talk to.

Absolutely great to stay at Vivianes apartment. It is even better than in the pictures. The hosts are great and we had absolutely no complaints! Would love to come back and stay again. The price is very fair as well!
A great host, very warm communication, nice and clean place to stay.

Very nice apartment,
Is no microwave so its little problem but all was just good

Very hospitable hostess . Spacious and clean apartment, great for non-expensive living in Eilat.  Close to the city center (3 minutes by car), nearby there are minimarkets and supermarket.  Recommended.

I had a nice stay in Eilat. The flat is very good located. Vivienne is a very kind person. She was picking me up from a bus station, when I arrived, and let to leave a luggage at the back way till my fly in her place. I would recommend a flat for a budget stay in Eilat.

Viviane and her husband are so welcoming. We had issues arriving because of a situation at the Dead Sea and they were so accommodating and friendly. Location is 12 min walk from Eilat central bus station. Plenty of room in the apartment and close to all amenities. I highly recommend this place in your stay to Eilat. Thanks again.
Viviane is very responsible person. The home is clean and very well. High recommended!
Spacious place at a great price. Very nice hosts.
Everything was perfect, 5 out of 5!
The apartment is nicely renovated, clean, no beetle, near to city center, near to shops. The neighbors make the yard dirty and messy! The apartment is worth the price!
We had a great time
Nice place, suited our needs perfectly!
Great location. Excelent price.
Great location, great owners. Just the third room is not private, it is in the back of tv.

Viviane is a great host. All requests that we had she responded immediately
Thanks

Vivianes place is a Great value for your money! Clean and Basic, comfortable beds and the snorkeling equipment was a bonus ! She even let us use it the next day until the next check in came  would happily book it again ! Thanks Viviane !
We had a great stay, Vivian was very helpful and responsive and the place was very clean, and had everything needed.
Very nice appartment in the center of eilat, you have many restaurants around and the sea is not far. Viviane and her husband were very welcoming with us. I recommend it!
Vivian’s sister host us. It is a cozy place. And she recommended a really nice restaurant. Very nice person.
Host was nice and helpful. Would be happy to stay there again

A basic apartment suited best for visitors who come to Eilat for the beach & sea. The apartment is spacious (we where 5 adults and had plenty of room), very clean, basically well equipped and Vivian is charming and responsive host. For us it was a very good deal.
Large apartment, well arranged,  perfect AC! Crucial in Eilat! Very nice hosts! Will defently return
Viviane and her husband are great hosts and we really enjoyed our stay, though it was short. The apartment is very close to amenities and the beach.
Great apartment, very clean and in a great location
a

Very nice and clean place.
The hosts are really nice and reliable and they have some good tips what to do in Eilat.
Nice place. Lots to do in Eilat
Great apartament sparkling clean. We had a very nice stay there. Viviane was always responding and very welcoming.
We found a clean place but will not recommend it to my friends. Flat needs a good overhaul.
reviews.response:
Thanks to be honest with the cleanest of the flat. It's important for the guests.
You forgot to mention that the beds are provided with new matras, you can use masks and tubas for free, you can use the washer for free, you have good wifi for free, television with a lot of channels, you have airco in each rooms, you can cook and also we pick up guests at the central bus station for free.
All this facilities is only for 100 NIS or $28 by guest and by night.

reviews.comments: I didn't feel willkommen in this apartment. It has spoiled the rest of my vacation. It is not the first time I rented an apartment via Airbnb and I had never a problem before. In the  apartment was no warm water when we arrived, O.K. it can happen. Next day they fixed it in in the morning, but there were a problem twice again, the electricity fuse when down when we wanted warm water, the boiler. So we had to go out from the apartment to fix it. A technical problem can happen, but the owner did not try to compensate us for the problem and they didn´t they didn't behave nicely. In the end we had a big  fight - we wanted a discount because of the problem with the water., in the end we got it. But the last words we heard were: "Such small people". She and her husband tried to hurt us personally. They told my friend that he is an unhappy person, has bad life, he doesn´t smile. And what a surprise, when few hours letter I found an email, that Viviane wants the money, whitch she gave us a discount. I don´t want to fight in vacation. Because of this I don´t recommend this apartmnet. It is pitty, because it is nice big, clean, there is everything, you need. It is only little bit far to walk from the town.
reviews.response:
I will try to make this long story short, my apartment is for 5 people maximum, they were 6 and asked if I could accept 6 with a supplement. We added extra bed and for the charge of 15 euros a night! Yes Pessah time only 15 euros. They arrived very late after 22.30, we welcomed them way after check in time, they were very tired, at 23.30 got a phone call no hot water. My husband went straight away and told them the problem will be fixed the next morning which was he went to fix it, but enventually it popped in their mind that this is an excuse not to pay 30 euros for number 6. The next evening got a call that no hot water, told the man to go half a stair down to put the plug up, probably too much electric at same time, the next morning when about to leave didn't accept to pay for number 6. So shame to have this kind of people trying not to pay. Thanks to airbnb help center who fixed this problem.
Surely bad experience with unhappy people , the place was left clean but bad vibes, will not recommend them.

reviews.comments: Enjoy your stay. Get a chanse to see the real eilat
Big apartment. Clean. All you can expect for 5 people. I guess even for more than that. There was extra bad and free leaving room.. It is close to anywhere since Eilat is quite small.
Big, clean, friendly host
Very nice host. Good localization and price. Viviane was very kind and gave us a lot of local tips.
Clean, comfortable and well-equipped apartement with 2 seperate bedrooms. Very close to the local shops and 10 minutes walk from the Bus Station.
Nice and clean. Viviane’s husband picked up us on the bus station so avoid our trouble with navigations.
We stayed only for 1 night but the place was very clean and it was a large place. Andre was very helpful and we would definitely go back here again. Thanks for the hospitality!

Vivian and her husband were friendly and helpful- everything was as it was described and the price very reasonable. The special and very appreciated touch was  the snorkel equipment! My Swiss friend was impressed by the cleanliness and that says a lot! We felt lucky to find it available.
Perfect place to stay in Eilat, véry friendly hosts! Spacious appartment, also very good for a family.
Nice apartment for a good price, and nice host, nice experience and it’s recommended

Viviane was an amazing host. She was there to meet us in the afternoon. We lost our way a bit, and she guided us to the place. She and her husband were really nice, showed us around the apartment and gave us tips on what we could do in Eilat. The apartment itself is located at a central but peaceful place. It was well-equipped and kept very clean. Will definitely recommend the place to anyone who wants a good comfortable stay in Eilat!

The apartment of Vivian was very well situated, just 10-15 minutes by walk from the Citycenter of Eilat. The apartment ist big enough for up to 5 person, communication was perfect, beds and bad were clean - everything i needed for 2 days without any useless luxus. Vivian offer us kindly to print our boarding passes for the Ovda airport which was also very usefull. Thank you!
Great appartment !

The best host ever! Vivienne and her husband were very nice, the picked us on the bus station. The apartment was cozy and clean. Also had washing machine, kitchen with full of staff, etc. This was our seco d time at their place, I can just recommend them. :)
Nice host, good local tips and not expensive.

Our stay at Viviane's place was excellent. Check-in was easy and the place was very clean! Viviane gave us tips around the surrounding and made us feel very welcome. The apartment is equipped well, shops are close by and it takes around 10-15m walk to the center beach. Would definitely come again. Thanks!

This is an excellent place to stay at in Eilat. The apartment was large and cozy. It was squeaky clean and it had everything it advertised. It was in a good location (close to the Casa Do Brasil steak house) and it was in a quiet and tranquil neighborhood.

Viviane's place is centrally located, and it has everything you need. communication with her was very easy and she even offered to pick us up from the airport when we arrived.
definitely recommended
Great host. Clean and cozy apartments for good price. Don't think there is something better in Eilat.
Viviane is an excellent host! Suelo make you feel at home!
Viviane was very nice. The apartment is very clean and spacious.  All what we need was in apartment.
love the place, thank you
Great apartment at a really good price. good for a long term stay because the apartment has everything you need. good location and vivian is a great host and very responsive
Nice apartment. Good value for money.
Nice and helpful host, clean apartment, we enjoyed our stay and recommend Vivian"s apartment
The host is friendly. The address shown on airb&b is incorrect, it takes a lot of time to find the apartment and the noice of both air conditioners is too loud.
reviews.response:
The guests didn't follow our instructions to find the apartment.
The description of the meeting point is clearly written on the site of Airbnb. The speed fan wasn't correctly adjusted. We don't ask cleaning fees and we ask to our guests to give us back our apartment in good condition, it wasn't like this.

reviews.comments: Nice, cheap and clean.
This place made our vacation great. Thank you Viviane!

the place was ok .we stayed just one night.
it was not gar from the beach.
at night it seems a little bit dark outside and (Website hidden by Airbnb) is inside a community not so good.
it was quite
supermarket near by
thank you for the quick response with us

The apartment was clean and communication worked very well. We got a lot of really interesting and useable tips what to do in Eilat and surrounding.
We always found a parking place in front of the door.
The apartment was big enough for us (4 people) but it didn't have a third sleeping room. So our son slept in the living room which was okay.
We had a great time at Viviane's place. The place was clean and Vivian very hospitable

Viviane's place was very pleasant. The house is a bit old and not too close to everything but taxi's are cheap and if you have a car is not a problem.
The kitchen is very well stocked.
Very nice place and very good host
Viviane was a great host. The apartment was exactly as expected and perfect for our needs. Great value for money. Highly recommend this apartment for a short stay.

It was a great stay at Vivian’s.
She recommended us very good places :)
The apartment is big and very nice 2 rooms.
We will come back :)
It is very comfortable place with a big living room. A very nice surprise was an scuba diving equipment. It was great because we could fully benefit form the red sea. Very nice stay.

We stayed 2 days in Eilat for scuba diving holiday at Vivianne's apartment.
The stay was perfect for us: a spacious, conviniet, clean apartment at a much lower price than a hotel.
The kitchen is fully equiped so we could cook.
Vivianne is very nice and responsive.
Overall, we are very pleased with the stay :)

Vivian was very nice, the apartment was also nice, a 15 min walk to the center.
The main issue was the dogs that barked all night long under the window, we couldn't sleep at all. This should be mentioned in the description so the people who are not heavy sleepers will k ow its not for them. Also there was a bad smell in the building and the stairs were flooded... Probably due to the rare rainfall which is untypical for Eilat.
Nice appartment and nice staying there, location perfect everything on walking distance.
Viviane and André are very kind persons. She gave us great advices and we felt comfortable.

Viviane and her husband were very friendly and helpful.
They even picked us up at the busstation and gave us a lift back there .
Communication was always fast and very efficient.
The Appartement was spotless clean and equiped with everything you need.
Near busstation and supermarket.
We fully recommend and hope to be back soon.
We though it was a pity there's no balcony or possibility to see the view
Cheap, but nothing special. Don’t expect for early check in or late check out.
reviews.response: Check in and check out written in the site, although I was nice enough to let you in before 16 pm. Next time you book a place book the right amount of people not nice to try to cheat. Happy new year.

reviews.comments: Thank you Viviane! We had a wonderful stay. Very highly recommended. The place was perfect for our family and your assistance, prompt responsiveness and graciousness was very much appreciated. Clean and spacious.
reviews.response: Thanks for your review Moshe have thd feeling will meet again.

reviews.comments: Stay perfect, clean and in the center. Viviane was very kind, we got a lot of useful tips and recommendations. Thank you!

Viviane's place was great! I stayed there with one other friend and there was way more space than we needed. Viviane was very communicative throughout the whole process and helped me with directions to the place. The place was in a good location. 15 minutes walking to the tourist center and the beach boardwalk! I only stayed one night and it was perfect for what i needed. The space was clean and organized.

The Flat is in a very central place, 15 minutes to the north beach, and 7 minutes to the Central bus station (by walk) and to the south beach you have to take a bus anyways, and this is also 10 minutes far by walk. It is in a real residential area, you live with Israelis around you, which makes the journey more deeper.
Viviane is also very friendly, she helps in every direction.
the Furnishing is the basic, this is the only point which could be better but still you have everything you need.
All in all, i recommended this place.
Great apartment, great host, wonderful experience!
viviane is very nice. the appartment is very clean. the 5th bed is very uncomfortable. not enough toilet paper and towels - request for more.
reviews.response:
Good morning Dana,
We met 4 retired ladies in our apartment for 1 night and I received from Airbnb 390 shekels, this is my price.
I don't understand your critics!
You said the 5th bed was very uncomfortable but it was a new mattres.
maybe this kind of mattres is not convenient for you.
You said not enough toilet paper but there was 2 new in each toilet!
Maybe not enough toilet paper for the rest of your tour in Israel!
If not : what did do 4 retired ladies in 1 night with 2 new toilet paper?
You said not enough towels, excuse me but you are not in an hotel.
Maybe in an hotel you have 1 for your hand, 1 for your head and finally 1 for your body, I don't know.
You forget 1 thing, you use my washer and you stay only 1 night!
So, maybe Airbnb formula is not for 4 retired ladies, who knows.
Now, all our future guesses can have his own opinion over my very cheap apartment.
Have a good day Dana and thanks for your comments

reviews.comments: very comfortable flat, central, with a washing machine , which was great for us. Enough parking in front of the building, supermarkets, restaurants, everything close by. Very nice hosts, the offered us to call them, whenever we would need something. But we didnt...everything was there! we keep this place in mind for a next time in Elat!

A little far from the city center but really good value for money and very nice host.

Good choice overall, especially if you have a car.

Accurately described and excellent value for money.  The apartment is close to shops and a short drive to the promenade.  Viviane provided excellent information and instructions about the apartment when she met us at check in and gave us additional tourist advice. We used the washing machine which was a great help.
Quite a few problems in the checkin arrangements. And Viviane was impatient to direct us to the apartment, disappointing
Our second time in Viviane's place. As before, everything is very clean, good shower, comfortable beds, cool ACs. Viviane is very nice and welcoming. We will return!
Great communication. Great value for money.

Everything was great! Apartment is very nice, cozy, and clean and has everything you need. Moreover there were snorkels and flippers, so you can use them to go diving.  Special thanks for "morning starters" - coffee, tea, etc. The owner is very pleasant and nice woman, she met us, showed the apartment, told everything we needed to know about staying there, even gave some tips about the neighborhood. We had a very good time! Thank you very much, Viviane !
will definitely come back
Nice place.  Clean and nice onwer
Comfortable and adequate.
Nice and quiet area. There are some 24/7 shops very close to buy groceries. Very close to the bus stop and close to the beach.
Viviane and Andre were lovely and extremely helpful/hospitable. We had a great stay and the apartment was very clean and spacious.
it is a very spacious place. has every thing you need for the stay
A family member died and they didn't care to give the money back, they piss... on everything
reviews.response:
When you write a comment don't lie, they are rules and I gave you half of the money back. You book 2 nights and you pay 1 night.
You are not fair with us, shame on you and you are very rude.
We talk on the phone and you were very pleased about this solution.

reviews.comments: Viviane and her Husband were very nice and accomodating. The Place is as described, basic and spacious. It is located near shopping, Restaurants and Red Sea. She gave us helpful hints for events, hiking and snorkeling. We all enjoyed our stay very much and would highly recommend.
Very comfortable house 15 minutes walk to the beach, The house is very clean and well organized, the host is very polite and handy, she helped us a lot!

Me and my family were very pleased to stay in Eilat in Vivians full equipment apartment with all facilities, close to downtown and the see. Vivian is a fantastic, kind, very helpful and understanding host, easy to get in contact with.
So I recommend her place for kind people and enjoy urgent stay.

Viviane is a great host
Very caring and helpful. The place is very nice and by all means recommended to families and groups.

First of all I want to thank Viviane cause she is a top host! The apartment is realy big and spacious. All the equipment is already there, so you don't need to bother to take most of the things that everybody takes - for example towels or washing powder :) Home was clean and set in quiet area. All rooms have AC! Beds are new and the sheets are top chef clean! The only thing I can say is - Thank you Viviane! and 10/10 ;)
Can I recommend
The apartment was good, clean, had everything we needed. Viviane was a great host

We really enjoyed stay in this appartment. It was really good for its price and had everything we needed - well equipped kitchen, comfortable bed,nice bedding, and even our favourite TV channel for evenings after long days full of adventures :) And also great bonus - snorkeling equipment, which we used in beach suggested by Viviane. She also gave us some other valuable advices regarding our stay.
I recommend, all as described :)
Big appartment with good location. The flat is equipped with everything you need for comfortable holidays in Eilat. I fully recommend Viviane's place.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot Marian and Andrey for your stay in the apartment and for having left it imaculate, welcome anytime.

reviews.comments: spacy place, 10 minutes walking from central bus station. Vivian very helpful.

Viviane thanks for the positive attitude and the nice reception. The apartment is comfortable and equipped with everything you need. Thank you also for the useful, local information. I want to choose the next time. To a lot of happy guests!
reviews.response: Guntars, thanks for the nice review, hope to see you again, warm greetings from Eilat.

reviews.comments: Great host, great apartment! Felt like a home immediately. Perfect for short or long stay in Eilat.

The place is in the living area of Eilat, the home is rather simple, but has everything you need (air con, washing mashine, dryer, iron, tv, wifi internet) and very clean. It's a good idea to double check the wifi hostname and pass at from bottom of the routher as the informaion on the post it Viviane left was a bit confusing.
If you have the chance go to one supermarcet furhter, it has a bigger selection and better prices. The one really close is 247 but and more pricey.
It's a very good idea to buy a 7 day Egged (local transport company card) at the airport, so you can travel in the region and also take bus 282 to and from the airport.
If you rent a car, you can get it online for about 50 USD for 1 day or cca 110 USD for 3 days so you can go to the desert, Red Canion and other places to see.

Viviane and André are one the best host around the world - they were very friendly and flexible in case of any request - I can only recommend them! My flat was booked for 5 days only for me but it is absolutely was suitable. If I will travel there once - I will not hesitate to contact with them!
excellent

Great big apartment with everything one needs. It is a bit old but very clean and comfortable beds. 15min walk into the "town center" 2 supermarkets close by. Safe area, but can be a bit loud as lots of dogs are around that bark throughout the night. If you are a light sleeper - you will need ear plugs. If you are booking Eilat Shuttle from Ovda Airport choose Melony Club as pick up/drop off point. Flat only around the corner. (Hidden by Airbnb) maps on airbnb is not correctly pin pointed - it looks like that First Club is closer - but that is not correct. Highly recommeded and would stay here again.

Viviane was very nice & helpful. This apartment was well equipped , super for 5 people, if you needn't a 5 stars hotel for some dollars. It's very simply, but better then a small hotel room for double price .  First shop is cca. 80 meters, but I reccommend the second shop, because it cheaper. City Beach is 20 minutes downhill (by walk), and up 35.

We had a great time in Viviane's spacious apartment and in Eilat in general. Viviane drove us to the apartment by car and was super friendly. Everything was spotless, the living room was huge and the bed comfortable. We would definitively go here again. Great deal!
Nice hosts, exact timing, clear apartment! I recommend it for everyone!
A simple apartment, just as described, but definitely a good value for the price. Very lovely and helpful host.

Viviane and her husband made our trip to Eilat just perfect ! they picked us up in the airport and from day one, we just connected and they helped us with different things in the apartment, as soon as we asked for anything they where there right away and we couldn't ask for better host family ! We lived 3 adult persons there (all single) and all of us in our own room, it worked very well, - also it is very nice that there is a extra toilet, when someone take a shower !!

It takes about 10-15 minutes to the north beach- and back home a bit more because it is up hill, but it was very good exercise !! - Vivian and her sweet sister did also drop us off at the airport the day we left Eilat (24 october 2016) (we had 16 nights there) and I/we really want to come back to visit be beautiful Eilat and our nice host family - they where the best and always with a big smile on there lips ,-) lovely people

The place was just as described. Very basic, but had everything we needed, including air conditioning. The communication with the host was good, always answered quickly, and was always available. The place is great for those not looking for luxury, but for a place having all the basic things that are needed. Thanks Viviane!
reviews.response: Olga it was a pleasure meeting you, really hope to see you again, I have very nice studios, thanks for your nice review.

reviews.comments: Good value for the price. Simple place if you are in good mode to spend vacation, with the money you save from expensive hotels you can dive, eat and party.

We and my three friends had a vacation in Eilat. Vivian was very nice and her sister was very helpful. The apartment is in a good location, not close to the beach but close to a supermarket.
Unfortunatly we werent satisfied!
The apartment is old,the floor is broken (so you cant walk without shoes otherwise you get cuts). The only good thing in the kitchen was the fridge. The kettle didnt work so we couldnt drink coffee in the morning. The oven and the stove didnt worked so we couldnt cook. The chairs were broken so we couldnt sit all together. In the living room, which was the badroom, one of the bads was too short so my friend had to sleep with his feet in the air. The sound of the televition didnt worked so we couldnt watch T.V. The hot and cold water was upside down so we get burned of we forgot that the cold water is the hot one. Lucky the washing machine worked but it didnt squees so it took too many time the dry the laundry. The apartment was full of musquitos and we get bitten many time.

The only releaf was that the a.c was perfect!
reviews.response:
Hello Chen and Gal,
Thank you for the compliment concerning us now about the appartment ...
Yes the appartment is old but:
about the kettle, you should have said right away that it wasn't working and I would have give you a new one.
The oven and stove is working perfectly you probably didn't turn the gas on.
There is no tv working, it was mention in the ad
The hot and cold water here in Eilat is often the other way around
The washing machine works, you probably turn on the wrong program without spinning, I use it every day
About the beds, the double one is big enough, the two singles also, now yes the couch is small but you didn't need it if you were 4
The stones on the floor need to be replaced you're right
At the end, you choose for a cheap summer appartment, if you standart was higher, we also had different studios.
No hard feeling, I still think you are nice people
Have a great evening

reviews.comments: were very nice, accomodating and flexible. the place was just as described, basic but comfortable.
Location is very good. The host are very nice. Clean. Instalations are okay. Also gave us important information about the city. Recomended.
nice place

הדירה בסדר, לא נוקה אבק בסלון. טלביזיה קטנה מאוד וקשה לתפעול, אין רשתות ישראליות אלא דרך יוטיוב, אין הוראות הפעלה. ההגעה לדירה בשכונה מוזנחת ביותר, הכניסה לחדר המדרגות מלוכלכת וחשוכה עם מדרגות שבורות. בהחלט לא מקום שאתה רוצה להגיע איליו לחופשה. בדירה אין באמת 3 חדרים אלא 2 חדרים וסלון לרוחבו נמתח וילון ליצירת חדר נוסף. שרותים ללא איוורור.
reviews.response:
Shulamite, I was a little surprised with your comment. You ask me to come around 2pm instead of 4pm. When you were in Eilat you phoned me at noon to ask to enter which I agreed. When I welcome you, you were very happy that I made this extra bed for one of your girlfriend.
You must be a very bitter person to make such a comment. Maybe you are use to fancy hotels so that's where you should go but our price was too attractive for all of you... Anyway your words are like a drop in the ocean for me and luckily I have nicer hosts than you
I wish you to be happy and to smile to life

reviews.comments: נקי נעים ומרווח
המארחת ענתה תמיד על הודעות במהירות ובנחמדות. ביום האירוח יצרה איתנו קשר מוקדם והייתה זמינה. ההדרכה הייצה ברורה. הדירה נעימה ופרקטית, מאוד מאוד נקייה.

היה כל מה שהיינו צריכים.. מיטה זוגית, ארון, 2 שירותים, מקלחת, סלון עם טלויזיה ונטפליקס, מטבח, מקרר וכיריים גז לבישול.
הניקיון היה אחלה והייתה אווירה נעימה ונוחה

שלום
אני נהנתי בסה"כ מהדירה הכל מאוד בסיסי ומסודר.
אבל המתכן כביסה נשבר תחת משקל של 3 מגבות רטובות. הוא היה ישן ומפלסטיק ופשוט קרס וחלקים ממנו נשברו.
בעלת הדירה חייבה אותי ב100 שח בסוף הביקור שלנו.
ולא היתה מוכנה לשמוע כלום
:( אותי זה מאוד העציב כי השימוש במתקן היה סביר והמתקן היה ישן
המזגנים עבדו מצוין, המיטות היו נוחות, המיקום של הבית נהדר, קרוב לים ולקניון

מדובר בדירה ישנה באזור ישן של אילת. לא מרכזי כפי שנאמר. נקיה ומסודרת ועם הציוד והריהוט שצריך, במטבח ובחדרים. אפילו אוכל בסיסי כמו שמן, סוכר, מלח וכו'. מאוד נוח שלא צריך להביא איתנו. יש אמנם 2 מיטות זוגיות ומיטת יחיד, אבל לא מדובר ב- 3 חדרי שינה כפי שצוין אלא שניים, כשה"חדר" השלישי הוא מרפסת שנסגרה ולא חדר סגור, ואין לו מזגן משלו. כמו כן אין אפילו הערוצים הבסיסיים של הטלוויזיה אלא רק טלוויזיה חכמה עם נטפליקס ויו טיוב, כשדרך היו טיוב אפשר לראות את ערוץ 11 ואולי גם את האחרים, לא בטוחה. לא בטוח שזה נוח לכל מי שמגיע, לצפות בטלוויזיה בצורה כזו, ואני לא מבינה מה הבעיה להשקיע חד פעמית בעידן +.
Хорошая квартира , все  необходимое есть, но очень далеко и высоко от моря. И очень шумные и со всех сторон

האירוח היה נפלא. מיקום מצוין של הדירה. ויויאן הגיעה להסביר על השימוש בדירה ועל החנויות/מסעדות שיש בסביבה.
מאוד נהנינו
היה מעולה

דירה נוחה, מרווחת, עם מטבח מאובזר.
מומלץ מאוד!
דירה ממולצת! הרבה מקום, שירות מצוין ואחלה מחיר
מקום מעולה, מרווח ומסודר. אחלה אופציה לאירוח
היה נהדר!

דירה מאוד מרווחת! שזה פלוס ענק!
הכל מאוד נקי. ריח קצת לא נעים בשירותים ובאמבטיה כנראה בגלל שהבניין לא חדש, ופתיר עם סגירת דלתות. אבל לא מחוסר נקיון כי הדירה מאוד נקייה! הניקיון היה חשוב לנו מאוד ובאמת מאוד מאוד נקי!
ממליצה לנווט עם גוגל מפס כי עם וייז הגענו לדירה אחרת ברחוב.
עם אוטו הכל מאוד קרוב, ברגל קצת פחות נוח.
הצק אין מול ויויאן והצק אאוט מאוד נוח, משאירים מפתח בכספת אז אין בעיה עם התחייבות לשעה. ויויאן הייתה זמינה וענתה מיד, נתנה המלצות על דברים באיזור.
מיזוג מצויין בכל חדר!
מזרון נוח, כריות גבוהות יחסית.
סך הכל חוויה מאוד חיובית המחיר ביחס לתמורה מאוד הוגן. מומלץ!!
פשוט מדהים
Leuke stad om vakantie te vieren en zon te zien tijdens winter in Nederland
Jó helyen lévő, tágas,  kiválóan felszerelt apartman. Extrák: 2 wc, békatalpak, búvárszemüvegek, bevásárló szatyor.  Mikro nincs.
Appartement bien équipé, très propre et nous avons réussi à nous garer devant.

Byt v 1 patře, velmi dobře vybavený pro 6 osob. Plně funkční kuchyň, pračka. Jediný problém byl s teplou vodou. Po příjezdu teprve zapneš bojler i tak voda stačí pro jednu osobu, další se sprchuje ve studené nebo dlouho čeká. Dům byl rušný díky dalším nájemníkům. Umístění bytu je dobré, kousek k centru i bus stanici. Viviane nám dala dobré tipy. Hned u domu obchůdek otevřený i o šabatu. K zapůjčení bylo i vybavení na šnorchlování. Celkově doporučuji.
Все было супер, спасибо большое)))
очень хорошие  гостеприимные хозяева рады будем отдохнуть у них еще раз

מקום נקי, מרווח, מתאים לחבורות של 6 אנשים בכיף.
אחלה תמורה למחיר.
בעלת דירה נחמדה מאוד וגמישה.
Хозяйка очень хорошая , не равнодушная ))) спрашивайте что интересно , все подскажет .
פתרון נוח ומשתלם לביקור באילת. ויויאן מקסימה ומסבירת פנים ועשתה מעל המצופה.
נקי ומסודר מאד. ויויאן מקסימה. מומלץ.

Het appartement was prettig in gebruik en was prima om een paar dagen in Eilat te blijven. We zijn wezen snorkelen bij princess beach, wat een mooie plek was om vis en koraal te bekijken. Fijn dat er snorkel spullen waren om te gebruiken. Om de hoek was een supermarkt (7days) waar de hele dag vers brood te krijgen was, heerlijk.
ottimo per un soggiorno ad eilat
Были только одну ночь. Два дня занимались дайвингом. Просто переночевать-прекрасный вариант. Чисто, точно, добрежелательно. Нужна машина добираться до моря.

המארחת סופר נחמדה .
דירהגדולה מאוד, היה ממש נקי ( המקום היה מצוחצח) . המיזוג אוויר מעולה , יש חנייה בשפע ברחוב .
אני בטוח יחזור להתארח בדירה הנסיעה הבאה שלי לאילת
תודה על האירוח.

Excellent. Proche plage et commerce
Appartement silencieux
C’était parfait
Merci Viviane

Merci Viviane pour tout
Logement silencieux
Parfait en tout
Mer et commerces à proximité
טוב מאוד

Отдыхали  в мае двумя парами. Все отлично. Чисто. 15 минут ходьбы от моря. Хозяйка очень гостеприимная - посоветовала много чего полезного в плане отдыха и еды. Тем, кому не нужен пафос, добро пожаловать :-)

Appartement spacieux, confortable et très bien placé. Viviane nous a donné de très bons conseils, notamment le Red Canyon dont le circuit court est magnifique (la partie longue un peu moins intéressante mais nous avons pu y voir un dragon, sorte de caméléon à tête bleue). Des masques, tubas et palmes sont mis à disposition pour pouvoir admirer les magnifiques poissons de la plage toute proche.

N'hésitez pas à aller faire un petit séjour chez Viviane. C'est une personne très agréable et accueillante. Elle vous donne des renseignements très utiles pour le séjour. L'appartement est simple et confortable. Le logement est situé à proximité des commerces et de la plage.
C'est une bonne adresse...
Хорошее расположение. Бесплатная парковка возле дома. Удобные кровати. Тихо. Близко до моря. На кухне есть все необходимое. Хозяин нас встретил, все показал и объяснил. Все было хорошо.
Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich und  hilfsbereit. Besonders hervorzuheben sind die super Betten, die großzügige Dusche, die gute ruhige Lage mit Supermärkten in unmittelbarer Nähe.
Excellent séjour chez Viviane et André. Ils sont très accueillants, réactifs, de bon conseils, ponctuels. Bravo et keep going!
Gut gelegenes Appartement um den Süden von Israel zu erkunden. Essen (zB omers )  und Supermärkte (24/7 ) in unmittelbarer Nähe.
Скромно, просто, гостеприимно.Тихое удобное место. В квартире есть всё для беспроблемного отдыха от моря. 15 минут спокойной прогулки до променада. Отличный магазин рядом.

appartement très spacieux
facile d'accès (1er étage)
hôte disponible, réactive et agréable

Хорошая и чистая квартира, в квартире все есть, утюг, гладильная доска, фен, машинка стиральная, порошки, много посуды, имеется два туалета что очень важно для большой компании))) расположение хорошее, в центре, рядом остановки и русский магазин! В каждой комнате кондиционер, чистое постельное белье, на каждого человека есть полотенце, в салоне три диванчика, в целом все понравилось
Apartamento muy bien ubicado en la ciudad.

Nous étions un groupe de 5 personnes et devions dormir à Eilat juste 1 nuit,
Quand nous sommes arrivés devant le logement prévu, Viviane nous a gentiment proposé un surclassement gratuit dans une magnifique villa, pour laisser notre logement à un autre groupe de personnes qui eux venaient plusieurs jours. C'était inattendu et on a beaucoup apprécié !!!
De plus Viviane nous a donné quelques conseils (restos, que visiter, quelle route prendre,etc.),
Bref, je recommande fortement !

Bonjour Viviane, merci encore pour votre accueil et pour être venus nous chercher quand nous étions  perdus. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié les équipements très complets de l'appartement et la bonne literie (toujours important en voyage). Tout était super.

Квартира большая, просторная, уютная, места много, все соответствует описанию, техника вся рабочая, при нас был отремонтирован кондиционер в гостинной, неподалёку расположены 2 супермаркета и автобусная остановка, до моря пешком минут 20, до центра около 10ти, в целом одна из лучших квартир в соотношении цена/качество, рекомендую!!!

Alles tipp-topp. Einfach aber geräumig. Grosser Kühlschrank. Wir waren zu fünft. Die fünfte Person hat kein eigenes Zimmer, das Bett ist aber im Wohnzimmer gut abgetrennt mit einem Vorhang. War überhaupt kein Problem.
Хорошая квартира, удобное место. Рядом магазины и есть место для парковки. Правда очень пыльная, если все помыть, то цена-качество будет на честные пять баллов.

Wij hebben gedurende 15 dagen het appartement bewoond.  Het appartement van Viviane is een uitstekende ruime uitvalsbasis in Eilat. Voorzien van afzonderlijke slaapplaatsen badkamer met toilet en ook nog een afzonderlijk toilet. Dicht bij alle voorzieningen en uitvalswegen. Viviane is zeer attent en gastvrij. De communicatie verliep zeker dank zij de social media zeer naar onze zin. Kortom zeker een adres om nog een te bezoeken.
Mooi appartement, alles netjes, erg vriendelijke mensen

Accueil chaleureux de la part de Viviane et André qui sont organisés et efficaces, et nous ont donné d’excellents conseils pour notre séjour.
L’appartement est très bien agencé pour vivre à plusieurs, l’equipement est complet. Commerces à proximité.
Séjour plus qu’agréable.

hôtes très sympathiques, tout était parfait.
A la prochaine.

Vivianes Unterkunft sah genauso wie auf den Bildern aus. Die Wohnung ist sehr groß, gut ausgestattet und war sauber! Die Kommunikation war super, Viviane antwortete wirklich sehr schnell auf alle meine Fragen. Leider blieben wir nur für eine Nacht.
Vi er familie på 5 der sov 5 nætter rimelig komfortabelt i boligen. Det er en rummelig bolig der virker. Boligen tilsvarer den rimelige pris. Ingen terrasse trækker ned. Jan december 2017

Вивьен просто замечательная. Заезд предполагался в 16.00, а мы приехали утром и Вивьен предложила оставить у нее дома наши чемоданы и налегке идти на пляж, что было очень удобно для нас. Также и при отъезде. Квартира очень просторная и чистая. На остановку трансфера ее муж Андре отвез нас на машине. Было очень приятно.

Vivianes Apartment in Eilat ist recht zentral gelegen, der Eingang und die Hausnummer sind aber von der Straße aus nicht zu sehen! Viviane antwortet schnell, sie hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen und besonders hilfreich waren die sehr guten Tipps beim Empfang, wo es gute und günstige Restaurants oder Frühstücksplätze gibt und wo man am besten an den Strand geht. Die Wohnung ist genau wie auf dem Foto zu sehen, bei Belegung mit 6 Erwachsenen müssen allerdings 2 im Wohnzimmer schlafen. Vielen Dank, Viviane, wir kommen gerne wieder!

Tolle Unterkunft mit sehr netter Vermieterin, die gute Tips hinsichtlich Restaurants und Stränden hatte! Die Kommunikation war super einfach. Die Wohnung selbst ist schlicht aber vollkommen ausreichend, um von hier aus Ausflüge zu machen oder an den Strand zu fahren. Ein Auto ist aber erforderlich. In direkter Umgebung gibt es zudem mehrere Einkaufsmöglichkeiten.
Квартира просторная, удобная.  Расположена в центре, есть места для парковки. Планировка удобная, спальни разнесены, у каждой свой санузел. Хозяйка гостеприимная, отзывчивая.  Рекомендую.

Довольно большая и светлая квартира. Хозяйка нас встретила, всё показала и рассказала. Впечатления остались самые приятные.
Great place, just as posted. It has everything you need for a couple of days and the contact (Vivien) was really great and available.

Достойная, очень чистая,  просторная и уютная квартира, гостеприимная хозяйка с необходимыми рекомендациями туристам.  Вивьен продумала за вас все до мелочей!!!( начиная от снаряжения для снорклинга и заканчивая сумкой для покупок)   Отличный бонус к проживанию- встреча и проводы на вокзал на машине!  Будем рекомендовать всем!

Дешево и сердито!
За небольшие деньги мы получили исчерпывающий набор удобств: холодильник, стиралку, кухню со всем необходимым, кондишн в каждой комнате, удобные кровати и душ. Всё. Если не искать понтов и не мериться потом с коллегами количеством звезд, то соотношение цена-качество просто идеально.
Бонус - набор масок с трубками и ласт в прихожей для любителей плавания вдоль рифа (а что еще в Эйлате делать). Очень мило.

Nous avons été accueillis par la soeur de Viviane dès notre arrivée à Eilat. Personne très sympathique. Elle nous a rapidement accommodés à l'appartement malgré notre avance sur l'heure du check-in, a gentiment offert de garder nos valises entre notre heure de checkout et de départ, et répondait rapidement et efficacement à nos questions. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié sa flexibilité!

L'appartement a répondu à nos attentes et était tel que décrit. Il était propre, bien situé, et bien équipé. Nous n'avons eu aucun problème ou inquiétude.

Notre séjour a été très agréable. Endroit recommandé!

We waren met twee gezinnen in het appartement van Viviane. Het appartement is schoon en ruim en voldeed precies aan onze verwachtingen: Een eenvoudig en schoon appartement om te slapen zonder een rib uit je lijf kwijt te zijn aan verblijfskosten, waardoor we geld overhielden voor andere dingen.
Viviane's zus deed de ontvangst en was erg aardig. Zij raadde ons de bakkerij aan de overkant van de straat aan: Een juweel. Wij haalden daar elke dag onze lunch, maar het is ook mogelijk om daar te ontbijten: Voor wie wil besparen op hotelkosten een uitstekende optie om toch deze service te krijgen tegen een redelijke prijs.
In de straat zit een kleine supermarkt, maar een paar straten verderop zit een grote supermarkt. Het appartement zelf is wat lastig te vinden: Achter de supermarkt een straatje omhoog lopen tussen flatgebouwen door en dan het juiste nummer opzoeken.
EL apartamento es amplio y muy confortable. Está muy limpio y muy bien acomodado a las condiciones de un viajero. Lo recomiendo.

Квартира полностью соответствует описанию и фото. Есть все необходимое, в том числе фен и утюг, которые почему-то не указаны в описании.
Хозяева очень доброжелательны и готовы помочь по любому вопросу. Наш самолет задержали и мы добрались до Эйлата лишь в час ночи, но Viviane прислала такие подробные фотоинструкции, что мы без труда нашли апартаменты.
До моря под горку с двумя детьми шести и девяти лет 10 минут пешком, обратно немного помедленнее - около 20. В соседнем доме есть небольшой магазинчик, где можно купить продукты. Супермаркет тоже недалеко.
Огромное спасибо Viviane и Andre за наш чудесный отдых на Красном море!
Super appartement, spacieux et propre ! Viviane a su nous conseiller sur les bonnes choses à faire dans le coin. Hôte très agréable ! Nous recommandons son logement !

Квартира Вивьен оказалась намного больше и приятней чем сложилось впечатление по фото. Хозяйка очень приветливая и общительная, даже учитывая то что наш уровень английского не высок, мы могли комфортностью ней общаться Ехали семьей из 5 человек, родители с двумя детьми и мама жены, всем было достаточно места. Расположение дома в котором находится квартира замечательное, пешком до моря минут 20 (учитывая что у нас был ребёнок в коляске и взрослый человек, который быстро не ходит) Обратно всегда возвращались на автобусе, так как не хотелось подниматься в горку. Автобусные остановки прямо перед домом, множество магазинов поблизости и супермаркетов и небольших круглосуточных и русские магазины тоже в пешей доступности. Спасибо Вивьен за наш отпуск в Эйлате.
Спасибо, всё было очень хорошо :)

Hôte agréable serviable et arrangeant
Groupe de 6 amis français
Je recommande.

квартира находится в старом и далеко не самом пристижном райёне Эйлата, в очень старом доме, без лифта на втором этаже.
квартира никогда не ремонтировалась, и, как мне показалось, не убиралась как положено, все очень старое и убогое, плитка на полу и в ванне сломана, гранит на кухне треснут, кухонные шкафы так же в плачевном состояние.
мебель старая и вся в пятнах.
кровать на которой я спала была страшно неудобная.
туалеты и ванна нуждалась в уборке, не хочется рассказывать подробности.
хозяйка не была со мной очень любезна и стала поучать как себя вести.
туалетной бумаги нам оставили мало ( пришлось покупать самим), да и полотенец по одному маленькому на человека на 3 дня( а мы ведь на море приехали)
из достоинств могу отметить что все электроприборы работали, кондиционеры тоже были в порядке но желания находится в квартире лишних 5 минут не было

квартира правда не дорогая но я 1000 раз пожалела о сделанном выборе и о том что не потратила
больше на свой личный отпуск и отпуск семьи
Zentrale, ruhige große Wohnung. Hilfsbereite und freundliche Gastgeberin. Ideal für Familien. Immer wieder gerne

Die Gastgeberin Viviane ist Super Nette Frau, die Wohnung ist Groß und Sauber. Man hat alles was man braucht, sogar auch die Lebensmittel. Die Viviane hat uns die Tauchmasken und gute Tipps gegeben, wo man gut schnorcheln kann, es sind sehr viele und schöne Fische da, einfach bezaubernd. Ich würde noch mal kommen! Vielen Dank!

Отличное месторасположение, минус которого только в одном, номер дома не обозначен с центральной улицы, и найти самостоятельно дом невозможно! Что касается самих апартаментов, то они просто прекрасны! Большая просторная квартира, в которой прекрасно разместятся до 6 человек. 2 санузла. Прекрасная кухня. TV с русскими каналами. Маски и ласты для snorkeling хозяйка предоставляет бесплатно. Отличный WiFi. Парковка общественная бесплатная около дома, проблем с местами не было. Viviane милая и отзывчивая женщина, которая решит любую Вашу проблему, начиная от обмена денег, заканчивая советами по экскурсионной программе, и на какой пляж лучше всего ехать! Пляж Принцесса  и обсерватория кстати буквально в 5-7 минутах езды на автомобиле, что очень и очень удобно!  Однозначно рекомендую эти апартаменты! Это отличный выбор!

Viviane, очень гостеприимна и общительна. Встретила нас со своим мужем, все объяснила и показала. Рассказала и про магазины, про пляж и заправки. Квартира очень светлая и красивая. Чистота и порядок. Есть полностью оборудованная кухня. Предложила средства от комаров, вечером если не закрыть окна они прилетают. Есть ласты, маски, трубки - чем мы и воспользовались и увидели великолепную красоту подводного мира Красного моря. Если вернемся еще в Эйлат обязательно остановимся у нее снова. Merci beaucoup, Viviane!
Danke Viviane, unsere Erwartungen wurden erfüllt. Sehr hilfsbereit. Interessante Informationen gegeben. Wir kommen bestimmt wieder!
sehr nette person,hilfreich und kontaktfreundlich. Wohnung sehr geräumig, sauber und ruhig.

Viviane est très accueillante et chaleureuse et aussi disponible pour toute question.
L'appartement est très spacieux. Il est situé entre 10 à 15 minutes à pieds du centre ville où l'on trouve tous les commerces, banque, poste, ...
Possibilité de faire une lessive, connexion internet rapide, et possibilité de cuisiner. Un grand frigo est disponible.

Вивиан очень доброжелательная хозяйка. Встретила на автобусной станции и проводила. При заселении все подробно объяснила: лучшие места для снорклинга, лучшие пляжи. Квартира оказалась просторная, чистая и оборудована всем необходимым для комфортного проживания. Это лучший вариант из найденных мной в Эйлате по соотношению цены и качества. Я был один, но в квартире с комфортом разместится 6 человек. Отличный вариант для компании. Большая кухня-гостиная, два туалета, две спальни. Рядом два работающих круглосуточных магазины, где можно купить все необходимое. До городского пляжи идти 15-20 минут, но это не имеет значения. В любом случае, на пляж лучше ездить за город, на южный берег Эйлата. Пляжи там восхитительные, на любой вкус. У Вивиан в квартире есть для гостей ласты и маски. Всем рекомендую.
Все было своевременно. Описание соответствует реальности. Цена=качество. Хорошие хозяева

Muy comodo el apartamento ,, Cerca del centro de Eilat ,, Limpio , Ordenado ,, me encanto haberme hospedado en el , Muchas gracias por darnos la oportunidad de pasar nuestras vacaciones en el :)
Lo disfrutamos mucho .

name: *SUNSHINE SUITES DELUX SUF*
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Backyard - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Pets allowed - Assistance animals are always allowed
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: סאנשיין סוייטות דלוקס (SUNSHINE SUITES DELUX).הינו מתחם ייחודי הכולל 12 סוויטות אירוח מעוצבות ומאובזרות ברמה גבוהה מאוד, הבניין נמצא במיקום מצויין במרחק 2 כיכרות בלבד מקניון מול הים, הטיילת הראשית וחופי הים המרכזיים של אילת.בנוסף בקרבת מקום במרחק של 20 מטר בלבד ניתן למצוא סופרמרקט גדול, קיוסק שעובד 24/7, פיצריה כשרה, גלידריה, מסעדה איטלקית, מסעדת אוכל מבושל, מספרה ועוד..

name: Sun and Sea
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Barbecue utensils - Grill, charcoal, bamboo skewers/iron skewers, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Private backyard – Not fully fenced - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Single level home - No stairs in home
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: יחידה מקסימה, נעימה ונקייה, מתאימה בעיקר לאירוח זוג או זוג + 2 ילדים, במקום חדר שינה ובו מקלחת ושירותים צמודים, בנוסף סלון עם ספה נפתחת וטלוויזיה חכמה, מטבחון מאובזר בכל מה שצריך, איזור ישיבה מוצל בחוץ עם שולחן ישיבה ואופציה למנגל. יש חניה בשפע ללא תשלום,מכולת במרחק 3 דקות הליכה, פתוחה עד חצות כולל שישי שבת.ניתן לרדת לחוף הים בהליכה של 10 דקות בלבד, או תחנת אוטובוס בקצה הרחוב. איזור שקט .The spaceWe are in the centre of the town close to everything.Guest accessThe unit and the seating area outside are for us of guests.Other things to noteמכולת נמצאת בקצה רחוב הצאלון, פתוחה שישי שבת. תחנת אוטובוס במורד הרחוב.
additional_house_rules:
No pets
No smoking
Extra guest will be charged for the full reservation not per night.must be 18 and over to book with us.
interaction: Walk up a few stairs when we are at home.and we will help you with what we can or phone,text,mail, whattup, are also an option the wifi is very good in the unit.
transit: A bus stop is 2 minutes walk from house with connections to taba, Ramon, center of town and lots more closest beach is a 10 minute walk.

reviews.comments: Everyrhing was perfect, clean, hot water, spacious, owner was extremely caring, coffee, sugar, salt was also provided, for us with a rented car localization was very good, close is cheap market, i recommend!
reviews.response: Thanks for review

reviews.comments: We like our stay at Yulit's place. Very cute, well-equipped and clean accommodation.

The apartment is very convenient for a 2+2 people.
Lots of parking near the apartment.
The hostess was very helpful and fast response to all our needs
Apartment was clean very workable and amazing host and a great location

Clean apartment, good location,
Few things, I think people have to know:
1) There is no gateway from a private garden to the street, so no option to let children go out to the garden without adults
2) the shower and toilet are very close, and no option to separate them during taking shower, which is really not comfortable...
In overall was good option in case you”re not going to spend a lot of time inside...

The place is comfortable, clean, friendly and welcoming. It has everything needed for a weekend. It is not our first visit to Scotland`s place and we enjoyed it very much (as usual).
We will surely come back.
Great place to stay alone or with friends!. A little bit far if you don’t come with a car. Occupied kitchen and great garden. Recommand!.
Clean, comfortable, attached yard which is great to sit outside, very responsive hosts, good for a smaller family, had a great time!

The place is comfortable, friendly, quiet, and welcoming. It has everything needed for a weekend. It is our fifth visit to Scottland`s place, and we have enjoyed it very much. We will surely come back and we have recommended it to our friends.
had a pleasant stay, much more than i expected. the apartment was clean, had everything i needed for a business trip.

The place is comfortable, friendly, quiet, and welcoming. It has everything needed for a comfortable weekend.
It is our fourth visit to Scottland`s place, and we have enjoyed it very much.
We will surely come back and we have recommended it to our close friends.
Great place for divers!

The place is comfortable, friendly, quite and welcoming. It has everything needed for comfortable weekend. It is our third visit to Scottand's place, so it is nothing to be added. We are recommending the place to our friens.
It is our second visit to Scottland`s place. And it was perfect, as it was the first time.

The place is fully equipped for all that we needed. It has a big and nicely arranged outer space, which was especially appreciated by me, as a diver for my equipment (and morning coffee).
The location is good. The place has good
'energies". Check-in and communication with the host are excellent!!!
We will surely recommend this place to our freinds and will be back.

A great cute  place, with a warm and homey feeling. Despite its size, it feels spacious and cozy, and provided with everything we needed. Sparkly clean and very easy to find, a great location not far from the beach. Wonderful communication. Highly recommended.

Scottland’s place is exactly what you’re looking for when staying in Eilat: comfortable, quiet, practical, cozy and a few minutes drive from everywhere in Eilat.

Scottland is a great host, super responsive since we first inquired about staying there and very flexible and thoughtful to our needs.

Next time we travel to Eilat with friends, we would definitely consider staying at Scottland’s again.

Thank you for everything!
Excellent place!
Cosy basement flat in good location. Newly furnished. Super friendly and personal host! Thanks!
Scottland's place is amazing - highly recommended for all travelers. We had a great time and would happily go back again :)

We felt very well at Scottland's accommodation. The accomodation was clean and comfortable and included everything we needed. Moreover, Scottland is a very nice and helpful person. We definitely would come back and highly recommend the place to other travellers.
Great place to stay. Close to city center. Very quiet neighborhood. Amazing stay. We loved it.

The apartment was clean and cozy. Check in and out very simple.
Apartment is close to the sea and a grocery shop.
There is parking right next to it.
We had a great stay.

We really liked these apartments.  Very clean!  All dishes are new.  Air conditioners work well.  Very quiet place.  There is parking for cars.  Nearby there is a grocery shop.  Close to the beach.  Very nice and sociable home owners.  Answers to any questions and help in everything.  We will definitely be back here!
היה נעים מאוד ומתאים למשפחה עם ילדים קטנים. התמונות והתיאור הוא בדיוק כמו בתיאור הנכס.

המקום נקי, יפה וסיפק את כל הצרכים שלנו!
הייתי חוזרת לשם בכיף

1. המיקלחת הייתה מתחת לכל ביקורת - האסלה במרחק 60 ס"מ מהמיקלחת ?
אין שום תמונה שבה רואים את השרותים והמקלחת ביחד (בתמונה של האסלה לא רואים את המיקלחת )
2.חדר השרותים נימצא בתוך יחידת ההורים - המשמעות היא שכל מי שהיה צריך שרותים חייב לעבור דרך חדר השינה .
איזה פרטיות יכלה להיות לזוג בחדר שינה כזה שבו בכל רגע משיהו יכול להכנס לחדר שינה שלו ?
3.הדלתות פנים הינם ישנות ובמצב ירוד ועלוב - ללא אפשרות לנעילה אפילו של דלת השרותים
לסיכום - למרות שבחרנו ביחידה יקרה יחסית לאכזבתנו מצאנו שאין שום יחס בן התשלום לתמורה שקיבלנו

הדירה מאוד נקייה ומאובזרת בדיוק במה שצריך, היינו עם שני ילדים קטנים והדירה סיפקה לנו בדיוק את הדרוש, מקום לינה נחמד נקי עם פינה חביבה לשבת בחוץ. מיקום טוב בשכונת וילות קרוב להכל בנסיעה כמובן, בעלת הדירה זמינה ועזרה לנו במה שהיינו זקוקים.
מומלץ!!

אחלה מקום! נקי, מסודר, שירות מהיר וזמין, חניה צמודה, בלי מדרגות, איזור שקט ונעים!!
