name: Lovely sunny 2 bedroom apartment with free parking
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Children’s books and toys for ages 2-5 years old and 5-10 years old
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Oven and gas top hob oven
Public or shared beach access - Guests can enjoy a nearby beach
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Beach essentials - Beach towels, umbrella, beach blanket, snorkeling gear
Single level home - No stairs in home
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: This newly decorated 2nd floor apartment is situated in a quiet part of Eilat. As you open the front door you are welcomed by the sunny bright atmosphere and stylish decor. You are a 5-15 minute drive to any of the amazing RedSea beaches, diving spots, popular attractions, shopping malls and restaurants. This apartment is perfect for 2 couples or a small family, looking for a perfect weekend in Eilat. All bedding and towels are provided for your convenience and we look forward to hosting you!

name: double or twin  room
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Building staff - Someone is available 24 hours a day to let guests in
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: the perfect diving center guest house  that has everything you need to feel like a local. there are 7 rooms at the property.clean quiet cozy and smiling people from all over the world :)private parking, swimming pool, large well equipped kitchen ,bbq area and more...  personal check in at arrival time.we will do our best to make your stay as pleasant as possible so see you soon :)may all who enter as a guest leaves as a friendThe spaceWe offer an introductory dive and diving lessonsGuest accessguest can use all facilities on the villa at any time :)may all who enter as a guest leave as a friendOther things to noteWe offer diving services in The most beautiful places for diving in Eilat
additional_house_rules: feel at home
interaction: we here every day all day long warm welcome and private check in- we explain everything to you and we also give detailed  information about eilat we will tell you all about most beautiful places of Eilat and attractions
transit: walking to the closest beach is 10min. shopping center,resturants and shops. it is close to a bus stop 15 min. and you on the coral beach, also 24 hours in the city it is possible to take a taxi

reviews.comments: Lovely place! The decorations are wonderful, the pool is great, and the rooms are comfortable!
Sweet lil place, nice and clean. Space was large and roomy. Very nice outdoor spaces with good shade.
a perfect getaway, with all the amenities and privacy, plus an awesome pool and outside setup! highly recommended
Custo’s place was great. Very clean, good location and very friendly hosts.

Wonderful quite cottage. We were a young couple and both felt very comfortable there! The hosts were helpful and kind. Felt like a home away from home!! If you want to be near all the action, but at the same time be able to have a peaceful time alone away, this is the place! Thanks again!
Perfect place to stay in eilat, colse to the beach with an amazing swimming pool. Our guest Dan was always here to help us out. I will recommand it very much!

This place is so great. you find yourself wondering if you are on the set of a television show about Travellers. There is a large common room, where you meet other travelers and exchange tips. There's a beautiful swimming pool(!) a large kitchen, and the rooms are very quiet. But best of all, dan was so extremely helpful. He has thought of everything you need, from the extra snorkel mask to the extra shampoo in the showers and he is always ready to help you with information: where is the best beach to snorkel? How long will it take me to walk from here to the airport? Dan went above and beyond to help us on our trip. Highly recommended.
Very Clean! Nice Hostel. Everything was good. Recommend it!
Great place, good host :)
Overall nice place, just missed the hairdryer and soap.
Very cool, clean and quiet place. We arrived after check-in time (1 AM) so the host instructed us about our room. Entering and finding our room was fairly easy.
It's a nice place to stay, but the people that work there don't really speak any English. We couldn't ask anything about Eilat. They were friendly, though.

The place was nice, but the people checking us in barely spoke English. They were friendly, but coudn't help us with any of our questions. Kitchen was fine, but only one burner on the stove was working.
Great place
Everything was great. Location: 15min by walk to the beach
Great place, helpful host.
Great stay at Custo’s. Place is great in a convenient location!
everything was good, a little further from the sea than we thought, but it is within walking distance with a good beach.
Great place!
Great spot with an excellent relaxed vibe. Even had in-room VOD! Recommend

We stayed at Guest House Custo for one night. It’s a very nice space, clean, tidy, has a swimming pool, very nice courtyard for socializing and a very big and equipped kitchen, as well as a lot of parking space near by. I’d say the only problem is that it’s not very close to the beach.
Nice and style place where you can relax and plan your adventures on the earth or below water.
Perfectly described, would happily stay again.
This place is a great find. One of the most stylish places for its price. Kitchen has everything you can think of. Location is fantastic. Great house in general.
We had a great stay at Custo's place. Philippe is a great host, and the apartment is beautiful.
The best place to Explor eilat...
Top!

Custo's place is great! A big open space with a great shared kitchen that's stocked with everything you need. The house is full of lots of light and the pool is a great refresher to jump into when you get home after a long hot day. It's a little bit outside of the city center and farther away from the more touristy spots in Eilat. Philip was a great host, really helpful in telling us where to dive and where the supermarket, etc. were. He also was very accommodating when we wanted to add another night. Overall, highly recommend staying here!
Beautiful place,  charming clean, but come with your booking at hand because manager has no information
Good stay.. but we didn't had time to go to the pool:)
Great place, really clean, and close to the beaches
Very very nice and clean. We love it!
We had a good stay. Everything was fine.
I liked this AirBnB. Nice and clean place, friendly staff, well-equiped kitchen and easy communication.
The House is kind of hostel, but cery cosy and calming eith amaising swimming pool. Dan was helpfull and very nice

Andrei made my arrival smooth and cozy. He was sensitive enough to notice that I am hungry after the long ride and yet still haven't done any shopping for food, so he offered me a Pizza, including different ingredients to upgrade it! That rest of the stay was simply wonderful. The cool swimming pool after a hot day of diving. The extremely comfortable hammock outside with the cool breeze at night was an exquisite place for reading and sleeping or even phone calls.
The bathroom was very convenient. I didn't really mind it, but one should be aware that it is common to a couple of rooms (depending on the room type you have).
The room included a small fridge and a private small porch that I used for breakfasts :-) and the bed was comfortable.
I would definitely recommend this place to friends and most probably return to it in future visits to Eilat
The room was fantastic! Nice decorations, incredibly clean and spacious. Andrew met us and was very helpful and we rented some snorkelling gear from their diving centre as well.

We stayed for only one night at the house after we had spent two nights in the desert. We were so tired that we fell asleep in the fresh and lovely smelling bed covers very early. So we didn't get to spend mich time with Dan and the other guests but I had the impression they were a funny and very lovely bunch of people. If I ever get back to Eilat I will stay there again and definitely take some diving lessons! :)
Very friendly and helpful!

If you're looking for a chilled place to stay in Eilat you don't have to look any further. Gusto diving is the place you wanna stay. A super nice villa situated between the mountains (road 12 towards red canyon is just 15 min drive) and the city centre of Eilat. The villa has a nice swimming pool, outside kitchen with BBQ, table tennis and lot of corners to relax both in sun and shadow. The kitchen is very well equipped. Everything you need to cook a proper meal you'll find there. You can store your food in the common big fridge or in your private fridge in your room!
The rooms are simple, but clean! Beds are ok!
We haven't met Dan, but Tanya was an excellent host! Very friendly and helpful!
We've been diving via the villa as well which we definitely recommend!
Eilat is self isn't a very exciting place to be but your stay at gusto will be!
Recommendations: snorkelling; bring water shoes! Rocks and stones can be painfully, hike the red canyon at the end of the day, eat an Ice cream at Pauline's ice cream! For the diving: bring something that shows that your insurance covers diving.

We were greeted by Tanya and immediately got a grand tour of the house, which we enjoyed very much. Tanya was very prompt in getting us everything we needed, from snorkelling equipment to tips on the best beaches. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. This place is basically run as a hotel, but with a more personal touch. Great!
Nice, comfortable and clean place. Dan was excellent.
Dan is super friendly, the location is perfect to go to the beach and to eat out at Marina - I'd definitely recommend this place!

Pictures correspond to the reality of the place.
Do i need to write more?
I definitely had a great Stay At Dan's Place, very nice Person, everything is arranged...just Perfect. Next Time again hopefully.

The villa was located near the city centre in calm district. There are a lot of facilities in a walking distance.
The owner was easy-going, very helpful and provided us with the attractions in the city. We strongly recommend this place for holiday!

Dan is really kind and helpfull !
Great stay in Eilat.

I would definitely recommend Dan's place!
The room was very clean and looked as on pictures. There were some other guests, but the villa is so big that actually we practically did not see them at all.
Dan is very friendly and helpful! :-)
We will come back for sure :-)
אחלה מקום לבילוי באילת. נטלי דואגת להכל. מומלץ!
otlichno.vsem sovetuu
לא מה שציפיתי לראות
Неплохо, но почему-то ожидали лучше. Возможно, недостаточно хорошо ознакомились с объявлением. Для бюджетных туристов подойдет)
Toffe plek om te verblijven. Dicht bij het strand ook ideaal als je wil snorkelen of duiken.

Die Villa liegt ca. 15 min vom Strand entfernt und 20 min vom Hbf zu Fuß. Einchecken verlief sehr schnell und einfach. Die Villa ist sehr schön gestaltet, der Pool und Sofas bieten viel Platz zum entspannen. Leider war ich nur für einen Tag, kann es jedoch weiter empfehlen.
Все отлично, очень понравилось
Schöne Unterkunft, sogar mit Pool.

Waouh ! Thank you very much for this amazing trip ! C'est un hôte aimable, accueillant et disponible qui nous a accueilli, très à l'écoute. La villa est magnifique et ressemble parfaitement aux photos ! Les chambres sont très propres et confortables ! Je recommande vivement ce logement !

Une bonne adresse à Eilat ? Je l'ai trouvé chez Dan, un aménagement de bon goût, correspondant aux photos, un accueil chaleureux et un suivi aidant,nous reviendrons plus nombreux et pas ailleurs que chez Dan :)
Отличное место! Отличные хозяева! Все было супер. В следующий раз останавливаться буду именно здесь.
Восторг! Супер! ПРЕВОСХОДНО!
A ház és a szoba tiszta, rendezett. A kert tiszta. Olyan mint a hirdetésben. Dan nagyon kedves, segítőkész, rugalamas. Legközelebb is idemennék.

Dan war ein klasse Gastgeber, welcher uns mit Rat und Tat zur Seite stand. Unser Aufenthalt in der Unterkunft war sehr angenehm. Alles war sehr sauber. Zur Strandpromenade ist es kein weiter Weg. Ein hauseigener Pool, eine große Küche und Chill-Ecken haben uns ein Urlaubsgefühl vermittelt, welches wir nach unserer Israel-Rundreise unbedingt gebraucht haben. Wir empfehlen Dan und seinen Tauch-Club wärmstens weiter.

Ich habe ein paar schöne Tage in Eilat verbracht. Dan war immer erreichbar. Das Zimmer und der Garten waren super. Besonders habe ich auch die Atmosphäre in der Villa genossen.
Dan war ein super freundlicher und aufmerksamer Gastgeber. Dankeschön!
